trans-unit.source: HealthTap allows members to “connect with” doctors. HealthTap does not reveal your real name or any other Personally Identifiable Information to doctors when you Follow or Connect with them. If you request a Private Conversation with an expert on HealthTap, and an expert accepts this request, your name and Health Activity will be visible to that expert.
trans-unit.target: 在您与医生联系沟通的过程中HealthTap不会向他们泄露您的真实姓名或其他个人可识别信息。如果您在HealthTap上请求与一位专家进行对话并获得许可，您的姓名与健康活动将对该名专家可见。

trans-unit.source: Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.) For a small fee, you can also ask a specific HealthTap Medical Expert a question by starting a private health conversation [Conversation].
trans-unit.target: 对于具体的、私人的健康问题，请您咨询您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者。（HealthTap的医疗专家不是您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者，他们对于问题的答案也不是针对个人的或是可用作私人的。）您可以通过支付一笔较小的费用来与一名具体的HealthTap的医疗专家进行私下对话式的提问。

trans-unit.source: If you include Personally Identifiable Information in any publicly visible submission to HealthTap, this information may be used in ways that you or HealthTap cannot control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在上传到HealthTap的任何可见内容中加入了个人身份可识别信息，这些信息可能会被用于您或HealthTap不可控制的途径。

trans-unit.source: For a small fee, you can ask a question to a specific Medical Expert on HealthTap. The doctor has a limited period of time to respond. These questions are private (not visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors) and secure. The doctor you ask the question to will be able to see information contained within your Health Activity and can aslo see you real name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过支付一笔很小的费用来向HealthTap上一名具体的医疗专家提问。这些问题是隐私（对HealthTap上其他会员和医生不可见）且安全的。接受您询问的问题的医生将会有权看到您的健康活动信息和您的真实姓名。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Unlike publicly visible questions and answers on HealthTap, you can provide Personally Identifiable Information in an Episode question and follow up.
trans-unit.target: 是。与HealthTap上公开可见的的问题与答案不同，您可以在一个片段式问题及其跟进中提供个人可识别信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit or delete information in your Health Activity by signing in to your HealthTap account and editing your Health Activity. Once you edit or delete a record, you cannot retrieve it. Information in Private Conversations cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能通过登录您的HealthTap账户并编辑健康活动来对其信息进行编辑或删除。

trans-unit.source: The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. Experts design our security measures and we use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use and disclosure. For example, information transferred to HealthTap is encrypted. We restrict access to personal information to HealthTap employees, contractors, and agents who need to know that information in order to operate, develop, or improve our services. These individuals are bound by confidentiality obligations and may be subject to discipline, including termination and criminal prosecution, if they fail to meet these obligations. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. More information about our security measures is located on our
trans-unit.target: 我们的安全措施由专家设计并使用一系列科技和程序来保护您的个人信息不受未经授权的获得、使用或公开。我们严格限制需要了解个人信息以运营、开发或改进我们的服务的HealthTap的员工、承包商和代理商获取这些信息。这些个人受保密义务的约束，如果他们没有尽到这些义务将会受到包括终止业务和犯罪起诉在内的法律的制约。然而没有一种网络传输或电子储存的方法是100%安全的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone unless you permit it. When you enter into a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap for a fee, you permit your Personally Identifiable Information to be made available to this doctor. HealthTap works by helping you find reliable and personalized health information. As part of this service, HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers (“Service Providers”) that may be of interest or use to you (for example, a health clinic). HealthTap does not provide these external Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent. Service Providers cannot access your Health Activity or other health and wellness information through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap除非在您允许的情况下，否则不会和他人分享您的个人可识别信息（比如您的真实姓名或邮箱地址）。当您付费与HealthTap上一名医生开始私人健康对话时视为您允许使您的个人身份可识别信息对其可见。HealthTap的运营理念是帮助您找到可靠的私人健康信息。作为服务的一部分，HealthTap会给您提供您可能感兴趣或对您有益的外部服务商（比如健康诊所）。HealthTap在没有您明确的同意下不会向这些外部服务商提供任何关于您的个人身份可识别信息。服务提供商不能通过HealthTap获得您健康活动或其他的健康信息。

trans-unit.source: You will be treating patients with non-emergency clinical care issues. The most common issues include coughs, colds, respiratory problems, abdominal pain, allergies, muscular pains, minor infections, fever, influenza, nausea, rashes, sports injuries, and strep throat. The patients you will be seeing will be physically located in the states in which you hold active medical licenses. Or they may be patients contacting HealthTap from overseas locations.

trans-unit.source: With the next generation of HealthTap, Ron is working to change the lives of billions of people by providing them with instant access to doctors, together with easy ways to manage their health and wellbeing. By doing this, Ron is fulfilling HealthTap’s ultimate vision of helping people everywhere live healthier, longer, and happier lives.
trans-unit.target: 随着HealthTap的下一代，Ron正在努力改变数十亿人的生活，为他们提供即时访问医生，以及管理他们的健康的简单方法。通过这样做，Ron正在实现HealthTap的最终愿景：帮助世界各地的人们生活的更健康、更长寿、更快乐。

trans-unit.source: No. HealthTap is not an ACA-compliant line of coverage, but rather an ancillary solution to bridge your clients' deductible gaps. It is the perfect wrap for a CDHP skinny plan, and is proven to streamline claims utilization both in the group fully-insured space and the group self-insured space. In fact, we typically drive healthcare savings of over $50 per employee per month for these organizations.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不是符合ACA标准的覆盖范围，而是一种辅助解决方案，以弥补客户的可扣除差额。它是CDHP瘦身计划的完美包装，并且被证明可以在组保险空间和组自保险空间中简化索赔利用。实际上，我们为这些机构的员工每人每月省下了至少50美金健康医护费用，这是我们的特点之一。

trans-unit.source: “End User Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and the End User, governing use of the HealthTap Software, the terms of which are subject to change by Licensor, at its sole discretion.

trans-unit.source: “HealthTap Minimum Retained Commission” means the commission identified in Exhibit A, based on the Annual Revenue Minimum.
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap最低保留佣金”是指基于年收入最低值的附录A中确定的佣金。

trans-unit.source: “HealthTap Software” means the software identified in Exhibit A.

trans-unit.source: “Licensee” means the licensee identified in the signature block to this Agreement.

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Commission” means: (i) for the Pre-Purchased Subscriptions, the Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap for all such Qualified Subscriptions, and (ii) for all other Qualified Subscriptions sold by Licensee via Licensee Links, the Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap minus the Base Fee for such Qualified Subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Links” means URL(s) to a HealthTap-provided landing page for Licensee’s distribution of the HealthTap Software to End User Groups.

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Program” means the program identified in Exhibit A, through which the License promotes the HealthTap Software.

trans-unit.source: “Minimum Number” shall mean the number of Qualified Subscriptions identified in Exhibit A.

trans-unit.source: “Materials” means marketing or other public-facing materials provided by HealthTap to License for marketing of or distribution with the HealthTap Software.

trans-unit.source: “Premium Price” means the rate per Subscription, identified in Exhibit A, that End User Groups pay for Subscriptions for End User Group Member under a Subscription Agreement with HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: “Pre-Purchased Subscriptions” means pre-purchased Annual Subscription.

trans-unit.source: “Qualified Subscriptions” means Subscriptions generated by Licensee through Licensee Links minus any Unqualified Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: “合格的订阅”，即由持证许可人通过持证许可人链接生成并已滤去了不合格订阅的订阅。

trans-unit.source: “Revenue Share Distribution Fee” means the fee identified in Exhibit A.

trans-unit.source: “Reporting Period,” means each period, identified in Exhibit A, in which the Qualified Subscriptions generated through the Licensee Program will be calculate and for which Licensee Commissions will be paid.
trans-unit.target: “报告时期”，即每个在附录A部分的并在这个时期通过持证许可人程序生成了合格订阅的时期，在这个时期持证许可人的佣金将被统计并支付给持证许可人。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription” means a new, pre-paid, non-trial, automatically renewing monthly Subscription to the HealthTap Software by a unique End User who did not previously have a Subscription to the HealthTap Software, and generated through a Subscription Agreement with an End User Group.
trans-unit.target: “订阅”，即一个新的、预付的、没有试用期的、每月自动更新HealthTap软件的订阅，这是一个独特的终端用户订阅的，他们之前并没有购买过HealthTap软件，也没有通过一个终端用户组群订阅协议产生订阅。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User Group governing the license of HealthTap Software for all End User Group employees or individuals eligible to receive benefits from End User Group (all End User Group Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: “订阅协议”，即HealthTap和一个终端用户群组之间的协议，此协议规定了HealthTap Software给所有终端用户组群的员工或有资格从终端用户群组获利的个体的许可，此协议的条款也要随HealthTap的变化，HealthtTap保留自行决定权。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement Fees” means fees collected by HealthTap for Qualified Subscriptions under Subscription Agreements with End User Groups, based on Premium Pricing.
trans-unit.target: “订阅协议费用”，即由HealthTap为合格的订阅收取的费用，此费用是根据与终端客户组群签订的订阅协议并基于会员价收取的。

trans-unit.source: “Unqualified Subscription” means: (i) any Subscription generated by Licensee resulting in a chargeback, cancelation, fraud claim, or for which a refund is issued; or (ii) any Subscription by an End User who was previously a Subscriber.
trans-unit.target: “不合格认购”是指：(i)任何经由持证许可人产生订阅若发生拒收、取消、欺诈索赔，或因为要求退款；或(ii)个曾经是订阅者的终端用户的订阅。

trans-unit.source: License. HealthTap hereby grants to Licensee a nonexclusive, nontransferable, license to market and and to distribute to End User Groups, the HealthTap Software and Materials, according to the terms of this Agreement. Licensee agrees to market the HealthTap Software as a benefit for all End User Group Members (and not as a “voluntary benefit”). Licensee may not sublicense the HealthTap Software to sub-distributors. Licensee may not copy, reproduce, sublicense, distribute or use the HealthTap Software or Materials, in whole or in part, other than as permitted under this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: 许可。根据此协议的条款，HealthTap因此授予一个被许可者一个非独家又不可转让的许可证，用以推销商品以及分配给终端客户组群。被许可者同意把HealthTap Software作为给所有终端客户群组成员的福利推销出去（不是志愿福利）。被许可人不得将HealthTap软件再许可给分销商。被许可者不得在此协议允许的情况下，全部或部分地复制、拷贝、许可、分配或使用HealthTap软件或资料。

trans-unit.source: Updates. HealthTap may periodically update or extend the HealthTap Software and authorize Licensee to distribute updated versions of the HealthTap Software (each an “Update”). Unless expressly permitted by Licensor in writing, at the time of any Update, Licensee shall promptly cease distribution or promotion of any prior versions of the Licensed Software.
trans-unit.target: 更新。HealthTap可以定期更新或扩展HealthTap软件，并授权被许可方分发更新版本的HealthTap软件（每个版本均为“更新”）。除非得到许可者特别的书面批准，在任何一次升级的时间内，被许可者应当立即停止分配或宣传任何老版本的已授权的软件。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Commission. Licensee is entitled to the Licensee Commissions for all Qualified Subscriptions sold under this Agreement. Within thirty (30) business days of the end of each Reporting Period, HealthTap will provide to Licensee with a Qualified Subscription Report detailing the Licensee Commission due for the Reporting Period, and shall pay any such License Commission due to Licensee. Licensee Commissions are due only after Subscription Agreement payments are received by HealthTap from the related End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 在每个报告周期的30个工作日之内，HealthTap会给被许可人提供一份详述报告期内许可佣金的合格订阅报告并由于被许可人付出相应佣金。被许可佣金仅在HealthTap收到其相关的终端用户组的订阅协议费用后生效。

trans-unit.source: Pricing. Licensee may set the Premium Price. The Base Price may be updated by HealthTap upon 30-days written notice to Licensee, where any such update shall apply to Subscriptions on or after the effective date of any such update; provided however that the Base Price applicable to any Subscription Agreement with a specific End User Group shall remain in effect for the term of any such Subscription Agreement, unless otherwise specified therein.
trans-unit.target: 价钱。被许可人可以设置溢价。基准价格调升时，HealthTap会提前30天发送书面通知给被许可者，任何这样的调升应在调升生效当天或之后用于所有的订阅；假设基准价格适用于任何与一个特定的终端用户群组签订的订阅协议，此基准价格应对任何订阅协议的条款有效，除非在某一点有特别情况。

trans-unit.target: 预付费用户。根据此协议，持证许可人同意以基准价格预先购买至少基本数量的合格的产品订购。这些年度订阅的价格在附录A有被提到。这应授予被许可者出售会员资格以得到佣金的资格。佣金问题在附录A中有被提到。

trans-unit.source: Revenue Share Subscriptions. Licensee agrees to Licensee pay the Revenue Share Distribution Fee. The price for this fee is set forth in Exhibit A. This shall entitle Licensee to sell memberships for the Licensee Commission set forth in Exhibit A.

trans-unit.source: Commitment. Licensee agrees to dedicate sufficient resources and efforts to fulfill its obligations under this Agreement, and shall use commercially reasonable efforts to market, promote and distribute the HealthTap Software as contemplated in this agreement, including but not limited to: (i) diligently soliciting qualified subscribers for the HealthTap Software; (ii) maintaining an adequate staff of personnel trained and qualified in the marketing of the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: 承诺。根据这份协议，被许可者同意贡献足够的资源和精力以履行它的责任，并应在商业上使用合理的方法去推销、宣传并分配HealthTap Software，在此协议中被考虑到的可能性包括并不限于：(i)努力争取更多订阅HealthTap软件的用户；(ii)保持足够的受过培训并有资格推销HealthTap软件的人员。

trans-unit.source: Representations. Licensee agrees not to represent the HealthTap Software in a manner inconsistent with the most current Materials provided by HealthTap to Licensee.
trans-unit.target: 表示。被许可人同意不以与HealthTap向被许可人提供的最新材料不一致的方式表示HealthTap软件。

trans-unit.source: Goodwill. Licensee agrees to take reasonable steps to ensure that the goodwill and reputation of the HealthTap is preserved and protected and will refrain from conduct that will cast HealthTap in a negative light or otherwise damage its customer goodwill and reputation.
trans-unit.target: 信誉。被许可者同意采取合理的措施已确保HealthTap的信誉受到了保护，并避免会使HealthTap陷入负面新闻的行为或其他损害客户声誉的行为。

trans-unit.source: Notice of claims. Licensee shall notify HealthTap immediately upon notice to Licensee of any legal claim or cause of action related to the HealthTap Software.
trans-unit.target: 声明通知。当被许可者收到任何与HealthTap软件有关的法律声明通知或诉因，被许可者应立即通知HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: Confirmation. Licensee agrees not to reveal any pricing for HealthTap Software to any potential new End User Group without first confirming that such group is not a current HealthTap customer or otherwise in conversation with HealthTap to potentially license the HealthTap Software. HealthTap reserves the right to not enter into more than one Subscription Agreement with any given End User Group, and reserves the right at its sole discretion to determine which Licensee, if any, is entitled to compensation for any referrals to any End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 确认。在没有第一时间确认此群组不是HealthTap现在的客户或以其他方式与HealthTap对话以有可能地给予HealthTap软件许可的情况下，被许可者同意不得向任何潜在新终端用户群组泄露HealthTap软件的定价情况。HealthTap保留不处理多于一份与任何终端用户组群签署的订阅协议的权利，并就决定哪一位被许可者——如果有的话——可因提交给任何终端用户组群而获得赔偿的问题，HealthTap保留最终决定权。

trans-unit.source: No unapproved use of name or marks. Except as provided herein, or as required by law, Licensee will not use HealthTap’s name, customers, or marks in any advertisement, news release or other public communication without the prior written consent of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 未经批准使用姓名或标记。除了在此处被提供的或是被法律要求的，被许可者不能在事先没有得到HealthTap的书面同意的情况下使用HealthTap的名字、客户或在任何广告、新闻稿或其他公共场合的通讯中使用过的商标。

trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term. HealthTap may terminate this agreement for convenience upon thirty (30) notice to Licensee but in the event of such termination Licesee shall retain the right to sell any Pre-Paid subscriptions under the terms of this Agreement for the applicable Calendar Year.
trans-unit.target: 条款。这份协议最初的条款应该是有效期后一年，然后除非被许可方向许可方于更新期90天前提供他意愿的书面通知，它将自动为另外一年更新。

trans-unit.source: Termination for Cause. Either party may terminate and cancel this Agreement immediately by notice to the other if: (i) the other ceases to carry on its business; or (ii) the other becomes insolvent, admits its inability to pay debts as they mature, is adjudicated bankrupts, or makes an assignment for the benefit of its creditors or other similar arrangement; or (iii) bankruptcy or insolvency proceedings are commenced by or against the other; or (iv) for a material breach, as set forth below.
trans-unit.target: 因故解除。若以下情况发生，双方的任何一方可通知另一方立即终止或取消此协议：(i)另一方终止交易活动；或(ii)另一方无力偿还债务、承认无法偿还到期债务、被宣判破产，或为其债权人制定了利益分配方案或其他类似的安排；(iii)另一方展开了破产程序；(iv)如下文提到的，发生了重大违约事件。

trans-unit.source: Termination for Material Breach. If any material breach of this Agreement by either party continues for more than thirty (30) days after breaching party’s receipt from the non-breaching party of written notice specifying the breach, the non-breaching party may terminate this Agreement by written notice, whereupon this license and all rights granted to Licensee herein shall immediately cease. Waiver by either party of any breach by the other party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any other subsequent breach. The rights of the parties under this clause are in addition to any other rights and remedies provide by law or under this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: 重大违约终止。在违约一方收到非违约一方发出的详述违约事件的书面通知后，若任何一方造成的任何重大违约事件持续超过三十（30）天，非违约一方应发出书面通知终止此协议，对此，此次许可以及所有授予被许可方的权利都应立即终止。发生违约事件后，被违约方的放弃不应被看作另一种违约。此条款中提到的各方，其权利还应加上法律或此协议授予的权利和补偿。

trans-unit.source: Effect of Termination. In the event of termination of this Agreement, the rights and licenses granted to Licensee hereunder shall immediately terminate and Licensee shall cease to market, distribute or sell the HealthTap Software; in the event of termination of this Agreement by Licensee prior to the end of any term, described above, any fees due to HealthTap hereunder for the term including but not limited to any Annual Revenue Minimum shall become immediately due and payable. Fees due to Licensee shall be paid within sixty (60) days after termination, following a final accounting of any Licensee Commission due as of the date of Termination. The provisions of this Agreement governing Ownership, Confidentiality, Limitation of Liability, the Relationship of the Parties, and Miscellaneous Provisions shall survive termination or cancelation of this Agreement for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 本协议中规定的所有权，保密性，责任限制，双方关系和其他规定的条款应在本协议终止或取消后仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: Neither Party, except as required by law or court or arbitrator of competent jurisdiction, shall divulge, furnish or make available to any third party, or without the other Party’s prior written consent any confidential or proprietary information of or concerning the other party (“Confidential Information”) or use the Confidential Information except in connection with performance of its obligations under this Agreement. Confidential Information includes methods of operation and organization, business plans, expansion plans, pricing schedules, lead generation information and data, and specific information that is designated by a party as confidential or proprietary. LICENSEE EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT BASE PRICING IS STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. Confidential information does not include information that (i) is already public knowledge or has become a part of the public domain through no breach of this Agreement; (ii) a party develops without any use of or reference to the other party’s information; or (iii) a party subsequently acquires by lawful means from a third party without any obligation of confidentiality to that third party.
trans-unit.target: 除法律或法院或具有适当管辖权的仲裁员的要求外，任何一方均不得泄露，提供或提供给任何第三方，或没有另一方事先书面同意任何其他方的机密或专有信息（“机密 信息“）或使用机密信息，除非与履行其在本协议下的义务有关。机密信息包括：公司组织与运作方法、商业计划、扩张计划、定价表、潜在客户的信息和数据，以及由某一方设计为机密和与专利有关的信息。被许可者清楚地知道并同意基准价格是高度机密信息。机密信息不包括：(i)已众所周知的信息或在没有违约的前提下被公开的信息；(ii)在没有使用或引用了另一方的信息的情况下，一方发展出来的信息；(iii)在这一方没有为第三方保密的义务的情况下，一方随后通过合法手段得到的信息。

trans-unit.source: Relationship of the Parties. Licensee is an independent contractor and nothing contained in this Agreement shall be construed to constitute either party as an employee, agent, co-owner, or other such relationship of HealthTap. Neither party has any right or authority to incur, assume, or create, in writing or otherwise, any warranty, liability or other obligation of any kind, express or implied, in the name of or on behalf of the other party, it being intended by other parties that each shall remain independent and responsible for its own actions. Licensee agrees to indemnify and hold the Company harmless from or against any damages or expense, including reasonable attorney fees, arising out of Licensee’s breach of this Agreement subsection (Relationship of the Parties).
trans-unit.target: 缔约方的关系。被许可者是独立的承包商，本协议中的任何内容不得解释其中一方为雇员、代理人、合伙人或与HealthTap的其他关系。任何一方都没有任何权利带来、承担或创造，以书面或其他形式，任何担保、责任或其他义务，明示或暗示，以另一方之名或代表另一方，其他各方均应保持独立和对自己负责的行为。若被许可方违反了本协议的分项（双方关系），被许可方同意赔偿并使公司免受任何伤害和花销，包括合理的律师费。

trans-unit.source: Non-Assignment, Amendment, and Survival. Licensee may not assign any of its rights or duties under this Agreement without the prior written consent of HealthTap. This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of HealthTap and its successors and assigns and to the benefit of the Client and the Client’s permitted assigns. This Agreement may be amended only by a written instrument signed by both parties. If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid, the remainder of this Agreement will not be affected unless the invalid provision substantially impairs the benefits of the remaining portions of this Agreement. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts.
trans-unit.target: 不转让，修订和残存。根据本协议，在没有事先得到HealthTap的书面同意的情况下，持证许可人不得转让任何权利和责任。本协议应具有约束力，并符合HealthTap、其继承人以及受让人的好处，同时也符合客户和客户允许的受让人的利益。只有同时具备了有双方签字的书面文告，此协议才能被修改。如果本协议中的任何一条条款被认为是无效的，本协议剩余的条款不受到影响，除非无效的条款实质上损害了余下条款的利益。本协议可以在一个或多个对应方执行。

trans-unit.source: Notice. Any notice required under this Agreement shall be deemed given: (i) when delivered personally; (ii) by email to the respective signatory to this Agreement, with confirmation of receipt; (iii) upon confirmation of delivery when delivered by shipping with confirmed delivery tracking to the then current address of either party.
trans-unit.target: 通知。本协议要求的任何通知应视为：(i) 当个人亲自配送时；(ii)通过电子邮件发送到本协议的各签字人，以确认收据；(iii)当确认交货时，通过航运与确认交货跟踪到当时的任何一方的当前地址。

trans-unit.source: Discontinued Services. Licensee acknowledges and agrees that HealthTap may, without breaching or terminating this Agreement, discontinue providing the premium services associated or affiliated with the HealthTap Software in any state at any time upon delivery of written notice to the Client, if HealthTap determines, in its reasonable discretion, that it must do so as the result of the regulatory environment in that state.
trans-unit.target: 停止服务。被许可人承认并同意：在未违反或终止协议的前提下，HealthTap可以在给客户发出书面通知后，随时随地停止提供与HealthTap软件相关或附属的高级服务。这样做是由监管环境所致。

trans-unit.source: Choice of Law. This Agreement shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the state of California without reference to conflicts of law principles. Any litigation or other dispute resolution between the Parties relating to this agreement shall take place in Santa Clara County or San Francisco County, California. The parties consent to the personal jurisdiction of and venue in the State and Federal Courts within these counties.
trans-unit.target: 法律选择。本协议受美国加州法律的管辖和解释，不涉及法律冲突原则。双方之间有关本协议的任何诉讼或其他争议解决办法将在圣克拉拉县或加利福尼亚州的旧金山县进行。双方批准这些县内的州和联邦法院的个人管辖权和地点。

trans-unit.source: Entire Agreement. This Agreement, including all Exhibits attached and any Addenda made effective pursuant to this Agreement, constitute the entire Agreement between the Parties concerning the use and distribution of HealthTap Software licensed hereunder and distributed under the Licensee Program. Any waiver or amendment of a provision of this Agreement shall be effective only if in writing and signed by authorized representatives of both Parties.
trans-unit.target: 整个协议。本协议，包括所有附件和根据本协议生效的任何附录，构成双方关于使用和分发根据许可证和被许可人计划分发的HealthTap软件的完整协议。对本协议条款的任何终止或修订意见，仅在双方书面授权代表签字的情况下有效。

trans-unit.source: By dividing apps into 30 separate categories, AppRx and the HealthTap Annual AppRx Report help users make sense of the vast landscape of health and wellness apps. The independent reviews provided by doctors on HealthTap help both patients and peer doctors learn which apps are medically sound, useful in supporting health or wellness goals, and easy to learn and use. The ratings reveal some surprising recommendations for best apps that might otherwise be missed.
trans-unit.target: 通过将应用程序分为30个不同的类别，App医生评测和HealthTap年度App医生评测报告帮助用户了解健康应用程序的广阔景观。HealthTap上医生提供的独立评价帮助患者和同行医生了解哪些应用程序在医学上是健全的，有助于支持健康或健康目标，以及易于学习和使用。对于那些容易被忽视的最好的应用程序，评分显示了令人惊讶的意见。

trans-unit.source: Affiliate wishes to promote Company’s services (“Affiliate’s Promotion”), described below (“Promoted Services”), and disseminate a customized Affiliate link provided to Affiliate by the company (“Affiliate Link”) to a landing page on the Company’s website and mobile apps (“Company Apps”) through which consumers can pay for the Promoted Services. Affiliate’s Promotion may take place through Affiliate’s website, apps, social media accounts, or other channels (“Affiliate Channels”).
trans-unit.target: 联盟计划希望宣传公司的服务（“联盟推广”），如下所述（“推广服务”），并向公司网站和移动设备的目标网页（“Affiliate Link”）提供一个定制的Affiliate链接应用程序（“公司应用程序”），消费者可以通过这些应用程序支付推广服务。联盟推广活动可通过联盟网站、应用程序、社交媒体帐户或其他渠道（“联盟渠道”）进行。

trans-unit.source: a. Company shall provide Affiliate with a custom Affiliate Link directed to a specific landing page (the “Affiliate Landing Page”) on the Company’s website and/or mobile apps (the “Company Apps”). Affiliate agrees that Affiliate is only entitled to compensation, as further set forth herein, for customer sign ups generated directly from this Affiliate Link.
trans-unit.target: a.公司应向关联公司提供定向到公司网站和/或移动应用程序（“公司应用程序”）上的特定目标网页（“关联企业目标网页”）的自定义关联企业链接。关联公司同意，只有直接从此关联企业链接生成的客户注册，关联企业才有权获得进一步阐述的赔偿。

trans-unit.source: c. Commissions are held for a period of 2 months from any purchase to protect Company in the event of any chargeback that may occur. Company shall pay all Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate within fifteen (15) days of the first day of each month after such holdback period (the “Commission Payment Date”). Company may withhold any Commission payments as well as any actual chargeback fees for which the Company is liable that are generated through transactions from sign ups through the Affiliate Link (“Affiliate Chargeback Fees”), from any Commission Payments to Affiliate. If at any time Affiliate’s Commission Payments balance is negative as a result of Affiliate Chargeback Fees, Company may suspend or terminate the Affiliate Link or Affiliate’s participation in the Affiliate Program.
trans-unit.target: c.购买者持有的佣金的两个月期间，保护公司可能发生的任何退款。公司应在扣除期后（“佣金支付日”）后，每个月第一天之后的十五天内支付应付给联盟的所有佣金。公司可以把佣金付款给关联公司，扣留委员会付款以及通过会员链接（“会员退款费”）注册交易产生的实际退款费。如果由于联盟退款费用，联盟佣金付款余额为负值，公司可以暂停或终止联盟链接，或联盟伙伴参与联盟计划。

trans-unit.source: d. If on any Commission Payment Date, the amount of total Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate is less than $25.00, then such accrued and payable balance shall be held over to the following month, and paid together with the Commissions due for that month. If at any time, the balance of accrued and payable Commissions is held over for 2 consecutive months, then Company shall pay all accrued and payable Commissions to Affiliate in the third month, regardless of the total amount owed. Payment is made via the Affiliate PayPal account or other account permitted by Company. Affiliate is responsible for any payment processing or PayPal fees associated with delivery and receipt of payment and understands and agrees that payments received will be reduced by any such fees..
trans-unit.target: d.如果在佣金支付日期时，支付给关联公司的佣金总额小于25.00美元，那么应计和应付的余额应持续到下个月，并与该月到期的佣金一起支付。无论任何时候，应计和应付佣金的余额持续2个月，则公司应在第三个月支付所有应计和应付佣金给关联公司，不论欠款总额。通过联盟PayPal帐户或公司允许的其他帐户进行付款。联盟负责与交付和收到付款相关的付款处理或PayPal费用，并理解和同意收到的付款将通过此类费用减少。

trans-unit.source: f. Nothing in this agreement guarantees that Affiliate will be successful or make any money under the program. Affiliate understands that no compensation is guaranteed for any efforts made.
trans-unit.target: 在这个协议中,没有任何条款保证附属公司会在项目中必然成功或者盈利.

trans-unit.source: b. Either Party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement at any time and for any cause. The Company may terminate this Agreement without notice. The Affiliate must give written notice to Company at least 30 days prior to the intended date of termination.
trans-unit.target: 任何一方在任何时候,都有权以任何原因终止该协议。附属公司必须至少在预定的终止日期30天前书面通知公司。

trans-unit.source: Term.
trans-unit.target: 条款。

trans-unit.source: Either Party may terminate this Agreement on written notice to the other Party if the other Party is in material breach of its obligations hereunder and fails to cure the breach within thirty (30) days of such written notice. In addition, either Party may, in its sole discretion, elect to terminate this Agreement on written notice to the other Party upon the bankruptcy or insolvency of the other Party or upon the commencing voluntary or involuntary winding up, or upon the filing of any petition seeking the winding up of the other Party. HealthTap may terminate this Agreement at any time and for any reason, including but not limited to any breach of this Agreement or the guidelines applicable to the Services. Notwithstanding the foregoing or any other provision of this Agreement, at any time the Practice or HealthTap may terminate this Agreement for convenience, without cause or liability for such termination, on thirty (30) days prior written notice given by one Party to the other Party.
trans-unit.target: 若另一方在履行职责中出现重大违约或未能在接收到书面通知的30天以内结束违约行为，那么一方可以书面通知另一方解除本协议。另外，任意一方可在下列情况发生时全权选择终止此项协议并书面告知对方：另一方破产或无力偿还对方或开始自愿或非自愿清算,或申请清算。HealthTap将随时以任何理由终止该项协议，包括但不仅限于任何违反该项协议或违反适用于服务项目的指导方针的行为。尽管前述事项或其他条款规定一方需提前30天书面通知另一方终止协议，但是为方便起见，在任何时候实践或者HealthTap可无故无责任终止该协议。

trans-unit.source: The Practice shall be liable for all fees and charges incurred prior to the date of termination and shall not be entitled to a refund of any License Fees paid by the Practice prior to the date of termination. All such fees are non-refundable. Upon termination, the Practice shall return to HealthTap, within thirty (30) days, at HealthTap’s expense, the original and all copies of Confidential Information furnished by HealthTap to the Practice hereunder.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime provides primary care virtual consults with doctors licensed in your state for limited diagnosis, care and prescriptions (as appropriate). HealthTap Concierge lets you connect with your doctor for viritual consults using the HelathTap platform, or with other doctors for second opinions or one-time consults for minor conditions that can be addressed and resolved, in the sole opinion of the doctor, via a virtual consult. HealthTap Premium Services can be a great resource between doctor visits, but are not a substitute for in person doctor visits, your primary care doctor or your primary care doctor’s independent judgment about any symptom, condition, or the appropriateness or risks of a procedure or treatment for a given person. HealthTap Prime is not health insurance and is not a substitute for health insurance.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime黄金帐号提供初级保健虚拟医生咨询,许可在你的国家进行有限的诊断，治疗和处方（如被适用）。HealthTap管家帐号可以让你与你的医生使用helathtap平台进行虚拟咨询，或提供其他医生的第二意见 或 通过虚拟咨询以医生的独家观点,在处理和解决次要条件后,进行一次性咨询。HealthTap黄金账户的优质服务是一个巨大的医生咨询资源，但不能代替私人的医生的建议，不能代替你的初级保健医生或你的初级保健医生对于任何症状，情况的独立判断，还有对于适用性,一个手术风险或特定患者治疗的独立判断。HealthTap Prime不是健康保险而且不能替代健康保险。

trans-unit.source: Scholars are highly experienced and accomplished doctors who have earned the privilege of curating the most trusted health information on the world’s largest Interactive and Mobile Health Platform. Scholars have a passion for helping people live healthier, happier lives; they are highly educated doctors who enjoy the respect of their colleagues (as reflected in a DocScore greater than 90), are active contributors on HealthTap, and perform ongoing exceptional peer review. trans-unit.source: “Annual Revenue Minimums” means revenue received by HealthTap (less any applicable Licensee Commission) equivalent to the value of the Minimum Number of Qualified Subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: “End User Groups” means unique employers or organizations with whom Licensee has a business relationship that have not entered into a prior Subscription Agreement with HealthTap or previously Subscribed to the HealthTap Software on behalf of all End User Group Members.
trans-unit.target: “终端用户组”指作为终端用户组成员代表的没有与HealthTap达成优先订阅协议或之前订阅过HealthTap软件的独特的雇主或组织。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Commission” means the Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap for Qualified Subscriptions less the Base Fee for such Qualified Subscriptions and any unpaid and due Annual Revenue Minimum.
trans-unit.target: 许可佣金是指HealthTap收集的合格订阅的订阅协议费用减去基础费用和任何未付和过期的最小年收入。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Landing Page” means a URL to a HealthTap-provided landing page for Licensee’s distribution of the HealthTap Software to End User Groups.
trans-unit.target: “被许可人的登陆页”是指一个给终端用户组的HealthTap软件的许可分发的到HealthTap提供的登陆页面URL。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Minimum Dates” mean the dates, identified in Exhibit A, by which either HealthTap shall have received the Annual Revenue Minimums; or, if not, the dates on which Licensee agrees that HealthTap may collect the Annual Revenue Minimum from Licensee using payment information provided by Licensee.
trans-unit.target: “被许可人的最小日期”是指被识别的HealthTap收到最低年收入的日期；或者，如果不是这样，被许可人同意HealthTap收集来自被许可人支付信息的最低年收入的日期。

trans-unit.source: “Qualified Subscriptions” means Subscriptions generated by Licensee through Licensee Landing Pages minus any Unqualified Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: “合格的订阅”是指被持牌人通过持牌人的登陆页面减去任何不合格的订阅所产生的订阅。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User Group governing the license of HealthTap Software for all End User Group employees or group members eligible to receive benefits from End User Group (all End User Group Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: 订阅协议是指为所有终端用户组成员的合理获益而签订的由HealthTap制定条款的HealthTap和一个终端用户组之间的协议。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Commission. Licensee is entitled to the Licensee Commission for all Qualified Subscriptions sold under this Agreement. Within thirty (30) business days of the end of each Reporting Period, HealthTap will provide to Licensee with a Qualified Subscription Report detailing the Licensee Commission due for the Reporting Period, and shall pay any such License Commission due to Licensee. Licensee Commissions are due only after Subscription Agreement payments are received by HealthTap from the related End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 被许可人有权收取这项协议下的所有合格订阅出售得来的被许可佣金。在每个报告周期的30个工作日之内，HealthTap会给被许可人提供一份详述报告期内许可佣金的合格订阅报告并由于被许可人付出相应佣金。被许可佣金仅在HealthTap收到其相关的终端用户组的订阅协议费用后生效。

trans-unit.source: Annual Revenue Minimum. To participate as a Licensee and distributor of the HealthTap Software, Licensee agrees that on or before the Licensee Minimum Date, Licensee shall meet the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any. In the event that HealthTap has not received Annual Revenue Minimums from Licensee Qualified Subscriptions before the Licensee Minimum Date, HealthTap may immediately collect from Licensee, including using payment information provided by Licensee at sign up, the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any, less any Qualified Agreement Subscription Fees collected and retained by HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 如果有参与HealthTap的软件许可和分销商，被许可方同意在最小的许可日期或之前，被许可方应满足最低年收入。如果HealthTap在最小许可日前未收到来自被许可合格订阅的最小年收入，HealthTap会立即从被许可人出收费，包括使用被许可人在注册时提供的付费信息，最小年收入将由留存在HealthTap的已收集的合格订阅协议费用中扣除。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Minimum Date Payments. On the Effective Date, Licensee shall provide payment information to Licensor for the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any. Where any Annual Revenue Minimum exists, such minimum shall not be charged to Licensee if the Licensee generates the Annual Revenue Minimum from Licensee Qualified Subscriptions under this Agreement each year on or before the Licensee Minimum Date.
trans-unit.target: 在有效期内，被许可方应向许可方提供年度最低收入的付款信息。假使任何最低年收入存在，如果在协议下最低被许可日当天或之前被许可人从被许可合格订阅中获得了最低年收入，这样的最低收入不能由被许可人负责。

trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term.
trans-unit.target: 条款。这份协议最初的条款应该是有效期后一年，然后除非被许可方向许可方于更新期90天前提供他意愿的书面通知，它将自动为另外一年更新。

If this Agreement is entered into by or on behalf of an entity, it shall govern all brokers or agents of such entity and any broker not covered by this Agreement shall have no right or license to distribute the HealthTap Software.

trans-unit.source: “Subscription” means a new, pre-paid, non-trial, automatically renewing monthly Subscription to the HealthTap Software by a unique End User who did not previously have a Subscription to the HealthTap Software, and generated through a Subscription Agreement with an End User.
trans-unit.target: 订阅是指一个唯一的终端用户之前没有订阅过HealthTap软件的新的、预付的、非实验的、每月自动更新的对HealthTap软件的订阅，它通过一个终端用户与HealthTap签订的订阅协议而生效。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User governing the license of HealthTap Software for the End User and all End User Family Members members eligible to receive benefits from End User (all End User Family Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: 订阅协议指的是HealthTap与有能力从其软件中获益的终端用户或终端家庭会员关于软件使用许可的规定而签订的协议，其中的条款可在HealthTap完全裁量权的情况下受其制约。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement Fees” means fees collected by HealthTap for Qualified Subscriptions under Subscription Agreements with End User, based on Premium Pricing.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions. All Subscriptions pre-purchased by Licensee must be sold to End Users (including End User Family Members), and used not later than December 31, 2016.
trans-unit.target: 由被许可人预先购买的所有订阅都必须销售给最终用户（包括最终用户家庭成员），并在2016年12月31日之前使用。

trans-unit.source: Termination for Convenience. HealthTap may terminate this Agreement for convenience on thirty (30) days notice to Licensee. Such termination shall impact only the Licensee’s ability to sell additional future Subscriptions and the terms under which any pre-purchased or previously sold subscriptions shall remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 为了方便，HealthTap可以在通知被许可方后三十（30）天终止本协议。这种终止只会影响被许可方未来销售更多订阅的能力，并且任何预购或以前售出的订阅的条款保持不变。这种终止只会影响被许可方未来销售更多订阅的能力，并且任何预购或以前售出的订阅的条款保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Effect of Termination. In the event of termination of this Agreement, the rights and licenses granted to Licensee hereunder shall immediately terminate and Licensee shall cease to market, distribute or sell the HealthTap Software; in the event of termination of this Agreement by Licensee prior to the end of any term, described above, any fees due to HealthTap hereunder. The provisions of this Agreement governing Ownership, Confidentiality, Limitation of Liability, the Relationship of the Parties, and Miscellaneous Provisions shall survive termination or cancelation of this Agreement for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 如果本协议终止，授予被许可人的权利和许可应立即终止，被许可人停止在市场上营销，分发或售卖HealthTap软件; 如果被许可方在上述任何期限结束前终止本协议，任何费用都根据本协议收取。本协议中规定的所有权，保密性，责任限制，双方关系和其他规定的条款应在本协议终止或取消后仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will see patients who are physically located in a state in which you are licensed. However, HealthTap is a global service that helps millions worldwide. Given the demand around the world for access to top doctors such as yourself, you may be asked to take international consults occasionally. These may be from U.S. citizens who are traveling or living overseas, or from English-speaking foreign citizens who wish to ask advice of American-trained doctors. You should take these calls no matter what state you practice in. You should treat the patient just as you would if he or she were calling from within the United States, including recommending the appropriate prescription in your SOAP note.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您将看到位于您获得许可的州内的患者。考虑到世界各地对诸如您自己对顶级医生的需求，您可能会被要求不定期接受国际咨询。这些人可能来自旅行或居住在海外的美国公民，或来自想要询问受过美国训练的医生的那些说英语的外国公民。您应该接这些电话，无论您在什么练习状态。您应该像对待来自美国的人一样对待所有病人，包括在您的SOAP注释中推荐适当的处方。

trans-unit.source: Seeing international patients.
trans-unit.target: 查看国际患者。

trans-unit.source: Just as you do in the real world, bring your wonderful bedside manner to your Virtual Consults!
trans-unit.target: 就像您在现实世界中一样，把您对待临床的方式带到您的虚拟领域！

trans-unit.source: A warm smile and greeting.
trans-unit.target: 温暖的微笑和问候。

trans-unit.source: The patient will trust in your experience, expertise, and skills. In return, you should trust that your patient is being honest and straightforward.

trans-unit.source: Trust.
trans-unit.target: 信任。

trans-unit.source: You should respect the patient as a unique, real person, and the patient will reciprocate by respecting your years of clinical experience and knowledge—and that you are a human being, too.
trans-unit.target: 您应该尊重患者并把他们看作是一个独特的，真实的人，患者将通过尊重您的多年的临床经验和知识作为回报 - 并且您也是一个人。

trans-unit.source: Mutual respect.
trans-unit.target: 相互尊重。

trans-unit.source: Efficiency.

trans-unit.source: Through your years of practice experience, you’ll know the relevant questions to ask the patient. Expect frequently the patient will have prepared for the consult using HealthTap, and will ask very informed questions.
trans-unit.target: 通过您多年的实践经验，您会知道要问病人哪些相关的问题。期望患者将经常使用HealthTap来为咨询做准备，并会提出非常不正式的问题。

trans-unit.source: Intelligent questions.
trans-unit.target: 智能问题。

trans-unit.source: The patient should be able to easily understand what you say.

trans-unit.source: Partnership.

trans-unit.source: (0.25Mbps or better). We strongly advise against taking video calls on 2G, 3G, or other mobile data connections. They tend to lack sufficient bandwidth to stream videos in high quality. Mobile 4G and LTE connections are often sufficient, but these video consults will use data that count towards your monthly data plan.
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈建议您不要在2G，3G或其他移动数据连接上接听视频通话。移动4G和LTE连接通常是足够的，但这些视频咨询将使用计入您的每月数据计划的数据。

trans-unit.source: Patients love the human connection and want your personality to shine through. trans-unit.source: To start your shift, log onto HealthTap (desktop or laptop) with your browser open and / or have the HealthTap For Doctors app installed on your iPhone, iPad, or Android smartphone, or Android tablet device and click “Start Shift” in the app. This will check you in to your shift.
trans-unit.target: 要开始换班，请在打开浏览器的情况下登录HealthTap（台式机或笔记本电脑），并在iPhone，iPad或Android智能手机或Android平板电脑上安装HealthTap For Doctors应用程序，然后点击应用程序中的“开始班次”

trans-unit.source: Between Live Consults, you are responsible for responding to all Inbox Consults that appear in your queue on a first-come, first-served basis.
trans-unit.target: 在众多在线咨询里，您有责任以先来先服务的方式响应队列中显示的所有收件箱结果。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap believes in providing only the highest levels of quality care by only the best doctors. If you have no Live Consults or Inbox Consults pending, you are responsible for helping us conduct peer review on the SOAP notes of your colleagues to provide an evaluation of others’ documentation for the purpose of quality assurance. For each consult peer review request, you will be asked to answer the following multiple choice question and to briefly explain your responses:
trans-unit.target: HealthTap相信只有最好的医生才能提供最高水平的质量保证。如果您没有在线咨询或收件箱结果待处理，则您有责任帮助我们对您的同事的SOAP注释进行同行评审，以便为其他文档的评估保证质量。对于每个咨询同行评审请求，您将被要求回答以下多项选择问题，并简要解释您的回答：

trans-unit.source: Excellent
trans-unit.target: 优秀

trans-unit.source: Adequate
trans-unit.target: 充足

trans-unit.source: Incomplete documentation (indicate what is missing)
trans-unit.target: 不完整的文档（指明缺少部分）

trans-unit.source: No justification documented for treatment recommended
trans-unit.target: 没有证据证明治疗建议

trans-unit.source: Questionable or inappropriate treatment for this condition
trans-unit.target: 这种情况可疑或不适当的治疗

trans-unit.source: Failure to recommend needed tests or treatment
trans-unit.target: 未能推荐所需的测试或治疗

trans-unit.source: Inadequate or inappropriate follow up recommended
trans-unit.target: 不足或不合适的后续建议

trans-unit.source: Other (inappropriate comments or tone, other concerns)
trans-unit.target: 其他（不适当的评论或语调，其他问题）

trans-unit.source: Millions of HealthTap members seek your expertise on thousands of health topics every day. Fill any downtime by answering questions, creating tips or checklists, reviewing news articles, and peer reviewing your colleagues’ answers to help others live happier healthier lives, enhance your reputation, and continue your lifelong pursuit of learning!
trans-unit.target: 数以百万计的HealthTap成员每天都会在数千个健康话题上寻求您专业的解答。通过回答问题，创建提示或清单，审查新闻文章，同行评审同事的答案，帮助其他人过上更幸福的生活，提高您的声誉，并继续您的终身追求学习！

There are rules you agree to follow when using our mobile applications and websites (the "Apps"), including when you ask questions and when you view or input content on or into the Apps, and they are contained in these TOU. The
trans-unit.target: “使用条款”（或“TOU”）是您与HealthTap 公司（“HealthTap”）之间的协议。使用我们的移动应用程序和网站（“应用程序”）时，您同意遵守以下规则，包括您在提出问题时以及在应用程序中查看或输入内容时，都包含在这些使用条款中。这个

If there is a conflict between these TOU and terms posted for a specific portion of our websites, the latter terms apply to your use of that portion of our Apps.

trans-unit.source: These Terms of Use may change. Because your use of HealthTap means you agree to these Terms of Use, if we revise and update these Terms of Use, your continued use of HealthTap will mean that you accept those changes. You choose whether or not you use HealthTap. If you do not agree to all of these Terms of Use, please do not use HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: and related web sites and HealthTap’s mobile applications, including HealthTap, HealthTapMD, and Talk to Docs.

trans-unit.source: ALL INFORMATION PROVIDED ON HEALTHTAP OR IN CONNECTION WITH ANY COMMUNICATIONS SUPPORTED BY HEALTHTAP, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO COMMUNICATIONS BETWEEN HEALTHTAP MEDICAL EXPERTS AND CONSUMERS, IS INTENDED TO BE FOR GENERAL INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY, AND IS IN NO WAY INTENDED TO CREATE A DOCTOR – PATIENT RELATIONSHIP AS DEFINED BY STATE AND FEDERAL LAW. HEALTHTAP IS NOT A SUBSTITUTE FOR PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS OR TREATMENT. RELIANCE ON ANY INFORMATION PROVIDED BY HEALTHTAP OR ANY HEALTHTAP MEDICAL EXPERTS IS SOLELY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上提供的或与HealthTap支持的任何与通讯相关的所有信息，包括但不限于卫生保健医疗专家和消费者之间的通讯，仅用于一般信息目的，并且不打算创建由国家和联邦法律规定的医患关系。HealthTap不是专业医疗诊断或治疗的替代品。对HealthTap或任何HealthTap的医疗专家提供的任何信息的依赖性完全由您自己承担风险。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap provides users with online access to health information from doctors.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为用户提供在线访问医生健康信息。

trans-unit.source: These decisions and choices are yours, and we believe that you, in connection with the advice you receive from your doctor or other professional healthcare provider, are the best decision maker about your health. You should always use common sense when making health decisions, and they should be made in consultation with your doctor. HealthTap cannot make decisions for you. What we can do is help you find good health information and connect with doctors for in-person care. On HealthTap you can ask and find informational questions and related educational answers and tips by Medical Experts. HealthTap is not a place for the practice of medicine, but Medical Experts on HealthTap can be a resource for reliable, relevant general health information. We hope these services will be of value to you. Please use them responsibly.
trans-unit.target: 在做出健康判断时，您应该总是使用常识，并且应该咨询您的医生。我们可以做的是帮助您找到良好的健康信息，并与医生联系以当面关怀。在HealthTap上，您可以询问并找到信息性问题以及相关医疗专家的的教育性的答案和提示。HealthTap不是医疗实践的地方，但HealthTap的医疗专家可以作为可靠，相关的一般健康信息的资源。我们希望这些服务对您有价值。请负责任地使用它们。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap contains Content, and may help you identify services or may offer services. Everything on HealthTap, including Content accessed or Services provided through HealthTap, are for your information, and should be used for informational purposes only. This means that Content and Services are not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, treatment, or care from your doctor.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap包含内容，并且可以帮助您识别服务或可以提供服务。HealthTap上的所有内容，包括HealthTap提供的内容或服务，都是您的信息，应仅用于信息目的。这意味着内容和服务不能替代医生的医疗建议，诊断，治疗或护理。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap you can connect privately with a doctor for an online consultation through our Private Conversation feature. This interaction does not constitute the practice of medicine and consultations cannot be used for providing a medical diagnosis or a physical examination, prescriptions, or treatments. Go see your doctor in person if you are looking for a prescription, or for diagnosis or treatment. You can use HealthTap for second opinions.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上，您可以通过私人对话功能私下与医生联系，进行在线咨询。这种交互作用不构成医学实践，并且这里的咨询不能用于提供医学诊断或身体检查，处方或治疗。如果您正在寻找处方，诊断或治疗，那就去亲自看医生。

trans-unit.source: Accurate and complete registration information is required to use HealthTap. All members are encouraged to use password common sense: safeguard your log in password, pick a password that cannot be guessed by others, keep it private, and periodically change it. You are responsible for the security of your passwords and for any use of your account. Please immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your password or account. As a part of registration you will create a profile with a Public Profile Name. Like your password, if you wish to remain anonymous, use common sense: safeguard your Public Profile Name, pick a name that cannot be guessed by others, and keep it private. Do not use your real name, or the real name of any one related to you when selecting your Public Profile Name. Allowing any other person or entity to use your identity for posting on or using HealthTap is not permitted. Do not include your real name or any other information that could be used to identify you in anything you post on HealthTap, including questions, comments, or other submissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用HealthTap需要提供准确和完整的注册信息。我们鼓励成员使用密码常识：保护您的登录密码，选择不能由他人猜到的密码，保持私密，并定期更改它。您要对密码的安全性以及您帐户的任何使用负责。请立即通知我们对您的密码或帐户任何未经授权的使用。与您的密码一样，如果您希望保持匿名，请使用常识：保护您的公开个人资料名称，选择无法由他人猜到的名称，并将其保留为私人化。作为注册的一部分，您将创建一个包含公开个人资料名称的个人资料。不允许任何其他人或实体使用您的身份在HealthTap上发布事情。不要包括您的真实姓名或任何其他信息，可用于识别您在HealthTap上发布的任何内容，包括问题、意见或其他提交。

trans-unit.source: Your use of HealthTap and any Content and Services must comply with all applicable federal and state laws, regulations, and ordinances. Currently, you must be at least 16 years old to use HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您使用HealthTap及任何内容和服务必须遵守所有适用的联邦和州法律，法规和法令。

trans-unit.source: When you register as a member, you agree that HealthTap may send notices to you by push notification or by email at the email address you provide when you register, or a different email address that you update through your Account Settings. We have a No-Spam policy. We do not sell or distribute the email addresses of our users.
trans-unit.target: 当您注册成为会员时，您同意HealthTap可以通过推送通知或电子邮件在您注册时提供的电子邮件地址或通过您的帐户设置更新的其他电子邮件地址向您发送通知。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap also provides for a category of premium, optional Services and Content or Apps that can be accessed for a small fee. ("Premium Services" and "Premium Content", respectively) All such Premium Content and Services are clearly identified as such. We will never ask you for your credit card or other payment information unless you indicate that you would like to use a paid service.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap还提供了一个高级类别，可选服务和内容或应用程序，少量费用即可访问。所有这些高级内容和服务都明确标识为这样。（分别为“高级服务”和“高级内容”）我们绝不会要求您提供您的信用卡或其他付款信息，除非您表明您希望使用付费服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a service for individuals to use to support their personal health decisions. You may use HealthTap for personal, but not for commercial, purposes. Organizations, companies, and businesses may not become registered members or use our Apps through individual members. Licensed doctors and other qualified medical experts (as described on our Medical Experts pages) may apply to participate on HealthTap for educational purposes as Medical Experts. We authorize you to view or download the Content and use the Services solely for your personal, noncommercial use in accordance with all applicable federal, state and local laws. The Content is licensed only for the personal, household, and educational use of a single individual. An individual's noncommercial reuse or redistribution of any portion of the Content is permitted when that use falls within what is permitted by United States Copyright law or the Lanham Act. These laws govern general personal use of copyrighted information. No commercial use or redistribution of any Content is permitted. Any hyperlink or other re-display of the information on another website must display the Content full-screen and not within a "frame" on the linked or other site, unless expressly pre-approved and permitted by us in writing. By using HealthTap, you agree not use any contact information provided by members (for example, in a private message exchange between connected members), or harvest, scrape or otherwise collect any information about our members for any reason, including but not limited to for sending unsolicited communications, including spam.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是个人用来支持其个人健康决策的设备。您可以将HealthTap用于个人，但不能用于商业目的。组织，公司和企业不得成为注册会员或通过个人会员使用我们的应用程序。有许可执照的医生和其他合格的医疗专家（如我们的医疗专家页面所述）可能适用于HealthTap医疗专家的教育目的。我们授权您查看或下载内容，并根据所有适用的联邦，州和当地法律，在您的个人，非商业用途使用服务。内容仅授予个人、家庭和个人许可的教育性使用。当该用途属于美国版权法或Lanham法案允许的范围时，允许个人对该内容的任何部分进行非商业性再利用或再分发。任何超链接或其他网站上的信息的其他重新显示必须全屏显示内容，而不是在链接或其他网站的“框架”内，除非我们书面明确预先批准和允许。通过使用HealthTap，您同意不使用成员提供的任何联系信息（例如，在连接成员之间的个人消息交流时），或收集、剔除或以任何原因收集关于我们成员的任何信息，包括但不限于发送未经请求的通信，包括垃圾邮件。

trans-unit.source: The Content and Services may not be used for any illegal purpose. You may not access our networks, computers, or the Content and Services in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair them, or interfere with any other person's use and enjoyment. You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any Content or Services, other accounts, computer systems, or networks connected with HealthTap, the Content, or Services. You may not use any automated means (such as a scraper) to access HealthTap, the Content, or Services for any purpose. Such unauthorized access includes, but is not limited to, using another person’s login credentials to access his or her HealthTap account. Any attempt by any individual or entity to solicit login information of any other user or HealthTap Medical Expert or to access any such account is an express and direct violation of these Terms of Use and of applicable law, including relevant privacy and security laws and laws prohibiting unfair or unethical business practices.
trans-unit.target: 内容和服务不得用于任何非法目的。您不能以任何可能损害，禁用，过度使用或损害其内容或干扰任何其他人的使用和享受的方式访问我们的网络，计算机或内容和服务。您最好不要通过未经授权的渠道进入任何与HealthTap及其内容或服务相关的内容或服务、其他账号、电脑系统或网络。您最好不要有目的地通过一些自动化方式（例如刮刀）来访问HealthTap及其内容或服务。这种未经授权的访问包括但不限于使用另一个人的登录凭证来访问他/她的HealthTap帐户。个人或整体的任何征求其他用户或医学专家的登陆信息，以及登录这些账号的企图都是一种直接违反这些使用条款和法律适用的体现，包括相关隐私和安全的法律以及禁止不公平不道德的商业行为的法律。

trans-unit.source: We do not recommend or endorse any specific Content, Services, tests, doctors, products, procedures, opinions, or other information that may be mentioned on HealthTap. HealthTap is designed to be used with common sense, and in connection with the advice of your doctor or your other healthcare provider. Reliance on HealthTap Content or Services is solely at your own risk. Some Content and Services, including posts by Medical Experts, may be or have been provided by third parties directly and are not reviewed or certified by HealthTap. We hope that our Content and Services will be useful, but we cannot guarantee that the Content and Services will help you achieve any specific goals or results. Content regarding dietary supplements or other treatments or regimens has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
trans-unit.target: 我们不推荐和认可一些特殊的内容、服务、测试、医生、产品、程序、意见和其他可能在HealthTap中提到的信息。HealthTap旨在与常识一起运用，并与您的医生或您的其他医疗保健提供者的建议联系起来。依赖HealthTap的内容或服务完全由您自己承担风险。一些内容和服务，包括医学专家的帖子，可能或已经是第三方直接提供的，我们希望我们的内容和服务会很有用，但我们不能保证内容和服务能够帮助您实现任何特定目标或结果。关于膳食补充剂或其他治疗方案的内容尚未由食品和药物管理局评估，并且不旨在诊断、治疗、治愈或预防任何疾病。

trans-unit.source: To the extent that any of the Content included on HealthTap is provided by third party content providers or other users, we have no editorial control or responsibility of such content appearing on HealthTap. Therefore, any opinions, statements, products, services or other information expressed or made available by third parties (including Medical Experts) or users on HealthTap are those of such third parties or users, respectively. We make no representations about the accuracy or reliability of any opinion, statement or other information provided by any third party, and do not represent or warrant that your use of the Content displayed on HealthTap or referenced content or service providers will not infringe rights of third parties not owned by or affiliated with HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 如果HealthTap中包含的任何内容由第三方内容提供商或其他用户提供，我们对HealthTap上显示的内容不承担任何编辑控制或责任。因此，第三方（包括医疗专家）或HealthTap上的用户表达或提供的任何意见、声明、产品、服务或其他信息分别是这些第三方或用户的意见、声明、产品、服务或其他信息。我们对任何第三方提供的任何意见、声明或其他信息的准确性或可靠性不作任何声明，也不代表或保证您对HealthTap上显示的内容或参考内容或服务提供商的使用不会侵犯非HealthTap所有的第三方 或隶属于HealthTap的各方。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not guarantee the accuracy of Third Party Content.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不保证第三方内容的准确性。

trans-unit.source: Now or in the future, the Content and Services may link you to other websites, apps, or information, software, data, or other contents, on or off the Internet. These other sites or and contents are not HealthTap, and the information there is outside of our control. What does this mean? It means that we do not control, endorse, or review the content of these sites. We do not review the contents that may be reached by such links, and we are not responsible for such content. Your linking to any other pages on other sites is at your own risk. The information, software, data, or other contents (including opinions, claims, comments) contained in linked references are those of the companies responsible for such sites, and should not be attributed to us. We have not attempted to verify the truth or accuracy of any such opinion, claim, or comment, nor do we endorse or support them. We do not warrant, nor are we in any way responsible for, information, software, data, privacy policies, or other content that is outside of our control.
trans-unit.target: 现在或将来，内容和服务可能会将您链接到互联网上或互联网上的其他网站、应用或信息、软件、数据或其他内容。这些其他网站或内容不代表HealthTap，并且其中的信息不在我们的控制之内。这意味着什么？我们不审查此类链接可能达到的内容，而且我们不对此类内容负责。链接参考中包含的信息、软件、数据或其他内容（包括意见、声明、评论）是负责此类网站的公司的信息，不应归于我们。我们没有试图验证任何这样的意见、声明或评论的真实性或准确性，我们也不支持它们。我们不保证、也不以任何方式对信息、软件、数据、隐私政策或其他不受我们控制的内容负责。

trans-unit.source: We only use data you share with HealthTap as stated in the HealthTap Privacy Statement, your personal privacy settings, and applicable law. If you create, transmit, or display health and wellness or other information while using HealthTap, you agree to do so with information that you own or have the right to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果您违反任何这些使用条款，那么您使用内容和服务的权限自动终止，您必须立即销毁您对内容的任何部分的任何副本。如果您在使用HealthTap时创建、传输或显示健康或其他信息，则表示您同意接受您拥有或有权使用的信息。

trans-unit.source: Email and short message service (SMS) or text message communications from HealthTap are not encrypted, and this information is not secured. You can opt out of receiving email, SMS, and text messages. By using HealthTap, you release HealthTap from any liability for interception or unauthorized access to unsecured communications.
trans-unit.target: 来自HealthTap的电子邮件和短消息服务（SMS）或文本消息通信未经过加密，并且此信息不安全。通过使用HealthTap，您可以使HealthTap免于拦截或未经授权访问不安全通信的任何责任。

trans-unit.source: There is no advertising on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上没有广告。

trans-unit.source: When you use HealthTap, you do so under a license from us. Your license to use HealthTap is personal, revocable, nonassignable, and nonexclusive. This means that you may not use HealthTap for any commercial purpose, that we can take away your right to use HealthTap, that you cannot give this license away to someone else, and that other members can use our Content and Services. All right, title and interest in and to HealthTap and the Content, together with all intellectual property rights embodied therein (including without limitation all engagement, rating, and ranking systems and methodologies on HealthTap) are the property of the Company or our affiliates. Rights retained by other parties in the Content, such as our Medical Experts, are their respective rights.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用HealthTap时，您在我们的许可证下进行。您使用HealthTap的许可是个人的、可撤销的、不可分配的和非独占性的。这意味着您不能将HealthTap用于任何商业目的，我们可以移除您使用HealthTap的权利，您不能将此许可证移交给其他人，而其他成员可以使用我们的内容和服务。HealthTap的所有权和利益以及内容的所有权，其中包含的所有知识产权（包括但不限于HealthTap上的所有参与、评级、排名系统和方法）均为本公司或我们的关联公司的财产。内容中的其他方（例如我们的医疗专家）保留的权利是其各自的权利。

trans-unit.source: We have obtained or applied for various Trademarks and service marks. HealthTap, the HealthTap logo, other HealthTap trademarks and service marks and other HealthTap logos and product and service names are our trademarks (the "HealthTap Marks"). If you would like to use or display any HealthTap Marks, you must ask our permission. Without our prior written permission, or according to the terms and guidelines we will publish in a media section of the Apps, you agree not to display or use in any manner the HealthTap Marks. All trademarks, brands, and content on HealthTap are the property of their respective owners.
trans-unit.target: 我们已获得或申请了各种商标和服务标志。HealthTap，HealthTap的徽标，其他HealthTap的商标和服务标志以及其他HealthTap的徽标、产品和服务名称都是我们的商标（“HealthTap标志”）。如果您想使用或表现HealthTap的标志，您必须征求我们的同意。未经我们事先书面许可，或根据我们将在应用程序的媒体部分发布的条款和准则，您同意不以任何方式显示或使用HealthTap标记。所有在HealthTap上的商标、品牌和内容都属于其各自的所有者。

trans-unit.source: You agree not to engage in any activity that would constitute copyright infringement with respect to the Content. You may not reproduce, create derivative works of, distribute, publicly perform or publicly display the Content or any portion thereof without our prior written consent. You may, however, use HealthTap as it is designed and intended to be used, including using HealthTap features which allow you to re-post Content or portions of Content, such as those which permit you to distribute Content through other third party applications and mediums, such as Facebook or Twitter, so long as you do not modify that Content or the functionality of those features in any way. This right to re-post Content does not create for you or grant to you any additional rights in such Content. trans-unit.source: 4 CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGE
trans-unit.target: 4 间接损害

trans-unit.source: As a HealthTap Medical Expert, you are required to register with and use your real name and (if you choose to upload a picture) a real image of you in your Virtual Practice.
trans-unit.target: 作为HealthTap医疗专家，您需要在您的虚拟实践中注册并使用您的真实姓名和（如果您选择上传图片）真实的形象。

trans-unit.source: Licensed doctors may apply to be and participate as Medical Experts on HealthTap. Physicians whose licenses are or become suspended or revoked, for any reason, are not permitted and agree not to participate in any way, including but not limited to submitting Content to HealthTap, as a Medical Expert on HealthTap. HealthTap may expand the network to include other licensed medical experts.
trans-unit.target: 执业医师可以申请并作为医学专家加入HealthTap。许可证被许可因任何原因或被吊销或撤销的医生是不允许申请，也同意不以任何方式参与，包括将内容提交到HealthTap作为HealthTap的医疗专家也不被允许。HealthTap可以扩展网络以包括其他授权的医学专家

trans-unit.source: You retain the right to edit and delete your own Expert Submissions that appear in your Virtual Practice at any time. You also retain the right to use and create derivative works from your own Expert Submissions elsewhere (such as on your own practice website, blog, or in your own social media posts).
trans-unit.target: 您保留随时编辑和删除您的虚拟实践中显示的专家提交的权利。您同样也拥有从您自己的专家意见书的其他地方（如在您自己的实践网站，博客，或在您自己的社交媒体网站）使用和创建衍生作品的权利。

trans-unit.source: When a HealthTap Medical Expert submissions related to any HealthTap feature or function and made for publication on HealthTap (such as an answer to a question) (an "Expert Submission"), you grant HealthTap an unrestricted right without limitation to use, reproduce, extract data from or add data to, publish and post any such Expert Submissions, including in connection with or on HealthTap, including in connection with your name. This means that when you make such a submission to us, you are giving us rights to this content, including the right to post it on HealthTap and use it in connection with HealthTap. You also give us the right to give or transfer all rights granted herein to others. While Expert Submissions generally are posted to HealthTap, we do not have an obligation to post any particular Expert Submission on HealthTap and reserve the right, at our sole discretion and for any reason whatsoever (including but not limited to an Expert Submission being reported to us), to not post and/or to remove any Expert Submissions at any time.
trans-unit.target: 当一位HealthTap的医学专家的提交文件与任何HealthTap的特性或作用有关并在HealthTap上（作为问题的回复）、（专家回应）发布，您已同意并授权HealthTap无限制地使用、复制、从中提取或添加数据后发布任何包括与HealthTap或您的名字连接的专家意见。这意味着，当您做出这样的提交给我们的同时，您给我们包括有权发布在HealthTap或使用它与HealthTap链接的权利。您也给我们权利授予或转让再此授予他人的所有权利。专家的意见一般都公布到HealthTap，我们没有义务在HealthTap上特别公布某位专家的意见并保留其权利。以我们的判断和以任何理由（包括但不限于专家提交的报告给我们），不发布或随时删除任何专家的意见。

trans-unit.source: So that everyone can enjoy HealthTap, we have rules for Content in Public Areas. A few things you should know:
trans-unit.target: 为了让大家可以更好地使用HealthTap，我们有公共区域内容的规则。您应该知道的几件事：

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts:Rules when Submitting Expert Content.
trans-unit.target: 医学专家：提交专家内容时的规则。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap answers should be relevant content that is educational and informational. Answers can provide general guidance, context, and illustration. You are welcome to refer to general medical conditions, symptoms and treatments, but please do not diagnose any individual member or prescribe any specific treatment in your answers. Individualized or diagnostic answers are not allowed and prescribing medications is not allowed. Answers should not provide specific treatment recommendations or give the impression that they are a substitute for a real-life consultation with a doctor. YOU ARE NOT PERMITTED TO PRACTICE MEDICINE ON OR THROUGH HEALTHTAP, EVEN IF YOU ARE INTERACTING WITH AN ACTUAL PATIENT OF YOURS. ALL MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS, TREATMENT, PRESCRIPTION AND ACTUAL CARE MUST OCCUR OFF HEALTHTAP, REGARDLESS OF ANY EXISTING RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的答案应该是与教育和信息相关的内容。答案可以提供一般指导，情况和说明。欢迎您参考一般的医疗状况，症状和治疗方法，但请不要以您的答案来诊断任何个人会员或规定任何特定的治疗。个性化或判断性的答案是不被允许的，并且处方药物是不允许的。答案不应该提供特定的治疗建议或给人留下他们能代替现实生活中向医生咨询的印象。您不允许通过HEALTHTAP行医，即使您是与您实际的病人进行交流。所有医疗诊断，治疗，处方和实际护理都不被允许在HEALTHTAP上发生，无论任何现有的关系之间的缔约方。

trans-unit.source: Feel free to interact professionally with members and create long-lasting relationships with those in your community. However, help us keep the personal information of our members confidential. Please don’t refer to members in or on Content in Public Areas by their real names, even if this information has been disclosed to you.
trans-unit.target: 您可以随时专门与会员进行交流并且可以与您社区里的人创造持久的关系。但是，帮助我们保守我们会员的个人信息。请不要在公共领域的内容中用会员的真实姓名提及他们，即使这些信息已经向您公开。

trans-unit.source: Responses should always be appropriate. Brief, casual, and friendly responses are the most useful. Help HealthTap remain a trusted resource, by avoiding potentially offensive content whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 回复应该总是适当的。简短，非正式和友好的反应是最有用的。通过尽可能的避免潜在的攻击性内容，帮助HealthTap保持为值得信赖的资源。

trans-unit.source: Feel Free to share your professional clinical expertise though answers that are evidence-based and consistent with accepted standards in the medical community. HealthTap is for general questions. Refrain from using language that suggests an answer is provided for a single member. Unless you are in a Private Conversation with a user on HealthTap, refrain from answering questions that solicit your individual opinion as a single Medical Expert. Avoid answering questions or providing answers that suggest a duty of care and a doctor-patient relationship.
trans-unit.target: 自由地分享您的专业临床专业知识，当然那是基于证据和符合医疗界的公认标准内。HealthTap是为一般性问题。避免使用那些能够表明答案是由一个会员提供的语言。除非您是以私人谈话的形式与一个用户在HealthTap交流，否则作为一个医学专家避免回答那些征求您个人意见的问题。避免回答问题或提供关于照顾的义务和医生与患者关系的建议。

trans-unit.source: You are allowed to link to external websites that are both appropriate and related to your responses, but answers on HealthTap should be complete and should not be used for primarily promotional purposes. Please do not plagiarize and cite sources where applicable. Using answers as a vehicle to promote a product or service is prohibited. Providing members with useful and beneficial information and attracting new patients through useful Content is permitted, but mere schilling is not.
trans-unit.target: 您可以链接到适当的并且和您的回应相关的外部网站上，但在HealthTap上的答案应该完成，并且不应该用作主要以促销为目的。请不要剽窃和适用的引用来源。禁止使用答案作为宣传产品或服务的工具。为会员提供有用的并且有益的信息，通过被允许的有用的内容来吸引新病人，但仅仅是先令并非如此。

trans-unit.source: Patients on HealthTap can find your professional contact information through your Virtual Practice, and can contact you for an appointment. However, please avoid violating medical board rules regarding advertising and patient solicitation.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap的患者可以通过虚拟实践找到您的专业联系信息，并且可以通过预约联系您。然而，请避免违反医学委员会关于广告和病人征集的规定。

trans-unit.source: Be careful not to discuss privileged or confidential details of past or current patients, or accidentally revealing confidential information in an indirect way – such as by discussing hypothetical illustrations that could be traced back to specific patients.
trans-unit.target: 小心不要讨论有关过去或当前病人的不能公开的或机密的详细信息，或者以一种间接的方式不小心透露机密信息，如通过讨论可以追溯到特定病人的假设插图。

trans-unit.source: Avoid other actions that violate board or other rules that apply to you.
trans-unit.target: 避免其他违反董事会的行为或适用于您的其他规则。

trans-unit.source: All other information, including suggestions, feedback, ideas, concepts and any other materials you disclose or offer to us on or in connection with HealthTap or any Content, are governed by the general member submission terms of this Agreement. This means that these submissions are made without any restrictions and without any expectation of confidentiality or compensation. You agree not to assert any property right or moral right of any kind with respect to any such submissions. You agree to our standard terms governing media submissions, except for the prohibition against uploading a facial portrait image of yourself for your Virtual Practice picture.
trans-unit.target: 包括建议、反馈、想法、概念和其他您披露或提供给我们的材料或与HealthTap相关的或由普通会员提交的本协议条款的任何内容，在内的所有其他信息。这意味着这些提交是没有任何限制,也没有任何保密或补偿期望的。您同意对这样的提交不维护任何产权或任何形式的道德权利。您同意我们的标准条款执政媒体投稿，除了禁止我们对你自己上传的脸部肖像图像的虚拟实践的图片的使用。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap permits Medical Experts to receive questions directly from specific members in Private Conversations. You will receive compensation for participating in Private Conversations according to the additional terms of the [HealthTap License Agreement and Business Associate Agreement], which are incorporated herein by reference.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap允许医学专家直接在私人的谈话收到特定会员所提的问题。根据附加条款[HealthTap的许可协议和业务合作协议]，您将收到补偿通过加入私人的谈话，所有这一切都被引入作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts may not post Content to Public Areas on HealthTap in exchange for compensation of any kind, including but not limited to as a paid consultant to any entity (including any company or organization) or individual. Medical Experts should ensure that any conflict or potential conflict of interest does not affect or appear to affect his or her contributions of Content to the HealthTap. Medical Experts may receive compensation for Private Conversations on or through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医疗专家不得将内容发布到HealthTap的公共区域，以换取任何形式的赔偿，包括但不限于作为任何实体（包括任何公司或组织）或个人的付费顾问。医学专家应该确保任何冲突或潜在的利益冲突都不影响或不能影响他/她在HealthTap咨询平台上所贡献的内容。通过在HealthTap的私人对话，医疗专家可以获得补偿。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap licenses our online and mobile platform to doctors who accept invitations to engage in Private Conversations between doctors and consumers.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将我们的在线和移动平台授权给接受医生和消费者之间私人对话邀请的医生。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap provides an online tool for doctors to provide consumers with quality health and healthcare related information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为医生提供了一个在线工具，同时也为消费者提供高质量的与健康和医疗相关的信息。

trans-unit.source: You may upload appropriate content to HealthTap and rights in submissions to HealthTap are governed by the HealthTap Terms of Use. Information in your Virtual Practice and any submissions to a Public Area of HealthTap are not confidential. Outside of these, we ask that you keep confidential all information exchanged between us and all information exchanged between you and HealthTap members in Private Conversations. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when you use HealthTap, including necessary privacy and HIPAA requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将相应的内容上传到HealthTap，提交到HealthTap的权利受HealthTap使用条款的约束。您的虚拟实践中的信息和HealthTap公共区域的任何提交信息将不会保密。除此之外，我们要求您保密我们之间交换的所有信息和您与HealthTap成员之间在私人对话中交换的所有信息。您同意在使用HealthTap时遵守所有适用的法律和法规，包括必要的隐私和HIPAA要求。

trans-unit.target: 网站 ("

trans-unit.source: means all confidential and proprietary information, whether received orally, in writing, or by or through a product, that is designated as confidential or that reasonably should be understood to be confidential given the nature of the information and the circumstances of disclosure. Confidential Information includes the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Participant submissions, information, and data, the HealthTap Services, and HealthTap’s: technology and technical information, product designs, business and marketing plans, and business processes. Confidential Information excludes any information that: (i) is or becomes generally known to the public without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; (ii) was known to Subscriber prior to its disclosure by the HealthTap without breach of any obligation owed to the HealthTap; (iii) was independently developed by Subscriber without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; or (iv) is received from a third party without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 不论是经口头，书面还是通过产品被指定为机密或根据信息的性质和披露的情况理应合理地保密的所有机密和专有信息。机密信息包括本协议，参与者提交，信息和数据，HealthTap的服务条款和条件：技术和技术信息，产品设计，业务和营销计划和业务流程。（i）是公众已知的或普遍知道的，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （ii）在HealthTap披露之前已为订户所知，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （iii）由订户独立开发，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （iv）从第三方收到，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务。

trans-unit.source: and related websites, and the HealthTap mobile apps and related apps.
trans-unit.target: 和相关网站，以及HealthTap移动应用和相关应用。
