trans-unit.source: HealthTap grants to Subscriber a personal and nontransferable, nonexclusive, worldwide, and nonsublicenseable license, during the Term: (1) to access and use HealthTap in connection with Private Conversations with Participants for which Subscriber will charge a fee for each Private Conversation (as amended or updated from time to time, the "Conversation Fee") to be paid by Participant in advance of each Private Conversation and (2) to use the HealthTap’s Marks for the sole purpose of identifying and promoting the HealthTap Services (defined below). This license is subject to Subscriber’s compliance with the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement. HealthTap may withdraw any approval of any use of the HealthTap Marks at any time in its discretion. Subscriber shall not make any express or implied statement or suggestion, or use the HealthTap Marks in any manner, that dilutes, tarnishes, degrades, disparages or otherwise reflects adversely on HealthTap or its business, products, services or the HealthTap Marks.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在期限内向用户授予个人和不可转让，非独占性，全球性和不可分许可的权利：（1）在与参与者的私人对话中访问和使用HealthTap，将为每个开通私人对话的用户收取费用（不时修改或更新“对话费”），且每个私人对话的费用需要由参与者提前支付（2）使用HealthTap的标记，唯一的目的是识别和促进HealthTap服务（定义如下）。此许可证需遵守订阅者遵守本协议中规定的条款和条件。HealthTap可以随时自行决定撤回任何使用HealthTap标志的任何批准。订阅者不得以任何方式对HealthTap或其业务，产品，服务或HealthTap标志作出任何明示或暗示，或以任何方式对HealthTap标志进行玷污，降级，贬损等。

trans-unit.source: Participants can pay for Private Conversations, and HealthTap shall collect these Conversation Fees. Subscribers can also provide Participants with a promotional code, which allow for a Private Conversation without a Conversation Fee (when such promotional codes are used, Subscriber shall not receive any compensation for any such interaction). Conversation Fees collected from Participants will be distributed to Subscriber by check or money transfer (using a service such as PayPal) after both (i) the total of the Subscriber’s Conversation Fees exceeds $100 (each a "Payment Distribution") and (ii) Subscriber request, and such distribution to Subscriber shall be the total of all collected Conversation Fees minus the applicable License and Subscription Fees. Conversation Fees and License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures
trans-unit.target: 参与者可以支付私人对话，HealthTap应收取这些对话费。订阅者还可以向参与者提供促销代码，允许在没有对话费的情况下进行私人对话（当使用此类促销代码时，订阅者不会因任何此类交互而获得任何补偿）。当（i）订户的对话费用总额超过100美元（每个为“付款分配”）和（ii）订阅者的要求和所有收集的对话费减去适用的许可和订阅费用的总和时，向参与者所收取的对话费会分发给订阅者来确认费用（比如使用paypal等服务）对话费和许可费和订阅费可根据HealthTap政策和程序进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall make best efforts to respond promptly to all Private Conversation requests. Subscriber is responsible and liable for all activities that occur in each Private Conversation, and: (i) has sole responsibility for all information provided in a Private Conversation, including the quality, accuracy, reliability, specificity, legality and appropriateness of the information; (ii) shall conduct each Private Conversation in adherence with HealthTap’s policies and procedures and, each as updated and amended from time to time; (iii) Subscriber shall not provide individual treatment recommendations or diagnosis in any Private Conversation; and (iv) Subscriber shall comply with any disclosure or disclaimer requirements of HealthTap. HealthTap will store archives of each Private Conversation, information on Participants, and Subscriber for at least the required legal period after each Private Conversation.
trans-unit.target: 用户应尽最大努力迅速响应所有私人对话请求。订阅者应对每次私下交谈中发生的所有活动负责，并且：（i）对私人会话中提供的所有信息负全部责任，包括信息的质量，准确性，可靠性，特异性，合法性和适当性; （ii）按照HealthTap的政策和程序进行每个私人对话，并且不时更新和修改; （iii）认购人不得在任何私人会谈中提供个别治疗建议或诊断; （iv）认购人须遵守HealthTap的任何披露或免责声明规定。HealthTap将在每次私下交谈后存储每个私人对话的档案，参与者信息和订阅者至少所需的法定期限。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber represents and warrants that the biographical information set forth in the Profile is true, correct and complete, and, Subscriber agrees to update Subscriber’s Profile immediately upon any updates to the information contained therein. In the event of any breach of the provisions of this Article 4, HealthTap and/or any of its parents, subsidiaries and affiliated entities, in addition to any other remedies available to them for such breach, including the recovery of damages, shall be entitled to injunctive relief to change any information in the Profile.
trans-unit.target: 订户声明并保证，个人资料中提供的履历信息是真实，正确和完整的，并且用户同意在其中包含的信息更新后立即更新订户的资料。如果发生任何违反本第4条规定的情况，HealthTap和/或其任何主公司，子公司和附属实体，除了任何其他补救措施可用于这种违约，包括恢复损害赔偿，应有权利得到禁令救济改变任何信息在配置文件。

trans-unit.source: As set forth in Exhibit A, Subscriber shall pay to HealthTap a fee for each Private Conversation as consideration for the license and HealthTap Services described in this Agreement (collectively and as adjusted from time to time, the "License and Subscription Fees"), which amount may be adjusted from time to time. The License and Subscription Fees are immediately due and owning at the time Subscriber accepts a Private Conversation request. The License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures. HealthTap’s fees do not include, and Subscriber is responsible for paying, any direct or indirect local, state, federal or foreign taxes, levies, duties or similar governmental assessments of any nature associated with Subscriber’s activities.
trans-unit.target: 如附录A所示，用户应向HealthTap支付每个私人对话的费用，作为本协议中描述的许可和HealthTap服务的费用（统称为不时调整的“许可和认购费”）， 金额可以不时调整。许可和订阅费在订阅者接受私人对话请求时立即到帐。许可和订阅费用可根据HealthTap的政策和程序进行调整。HealthTap的费用不包括，并且订阅者负责支付任何与订阅者活动相关的任何性质的任何直接或间接的地方，州，联邦或外国税务，征费，关税或类似的政府评估。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap shall retain all right, title and interest in the HealthTap Intellectual Property and Proprietary Material. Subscriber hereby transfers and assigns and agrees to execute any documents required to transfer and assign to HealthTap all rights, title and interest in the HealthTap Intellectual Property and Proprietary Material and related protectable elements or derivative works.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap应保留HealthTap知识产权和专有材料的所有权利，所有权和利益。用户在此转让和转让并同意执行将HealthTap知识产权和专有材料以及相关的可保护元素或衍生作品的所有权利，所有权和利益转让和转让给其所需的任何文件。

trans-unit.source: A. Ownership of Intellectual Property.
trans-unit.target: A. 知识产权的所有权。

trans-unit.source: As between HealthTap and Subscriber, HealthTap and/or Participant own all rights, title and interest in and to all content (including electronic data or information) submitted by any Participant to HealthTap in connection with a Private Conversation, and such submissions are considered Confidential Information under this Agreement and are subject to the HealthTap Terms of Use and Privacy Statement. Subscriber Content, including content uploaded to HealthTap, is subject to HealthTap’s Terms of Use and Privacy Statement. Subscriber agrees not to upload or transmit any Content that (i) infringes another’s rights, (ii) is confidential, (iii) contains offensive content (including hate-speech, obscenity, and pornography), or any material that could give rise to any civil or criminal liability under applicable law or regulations, or (iv) contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap和订阅者之间，HealthTap和/或参与者拥有由任何参与者提交给HealthTap的与私人对话相关的所有内容（包括电子数据或信息）的所有权利，所有权和利益，这些提交被视为机密信息；根据本协议，并受HealthTap的使用条款和隐私声明的约束。订阅者内容（包括上传到HealthTap的内容）需遵守HealthTap的使用条款和隐私权声明。订阅者同意不会上传或传输（i）侵犯他人的权利，（ii）保密，（iii）包含攻击性内容（包括仇恨言论，淫秽内容和色情内容）或任何可能引起任何 民事或刑事责任，或（iv）包含设计用于中断，破坏或限制任何计算机软件或HealthTap的功能的软件病毒或任何其他计算机代码，文件或程序。

trans-unit.source: B. Participant Content and Subscriber Content.
trans-unit.target: B. 参与者内容和订阅者内容。

trans-unit.source: 7. Restrictions.

Confidential information disclosed by HealthTap to Subscriber shall not be disclosed or used by Subscriber for any purpose outside the scope of this Agreement, except with HealthTap’s prior written permission, and Subscriber shall protect the Confidential Information as it would its own.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap向订户披露的机密信息不得由于本协议范围之外的任何目的而被用户公开或使用，除非获得HealthTap的事先书面许可，用户则须保护机密信息。

trans-unit.source: A. Confidential information
trans-unit.target: A 保密信息

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall use HealthTap solely as contemplated by this Agreement and shall not: (i) license, sublicense, sell, resell, rent, lease, transfer, assign, distribute, time share or otherwise commercially exploit or make HealthTap available to any third party, except as otherwise contemplated by this Agreement; (ii) send duplicative or unsolicited messages in violation of applicable laws; (iii) send or store infringing, obscene, threatening, libelous, or otherwise unlawful or tortuous material, including material that is harmful to children or violates third party privacy rights; (iv) send or store Malicious Code on or through HealthTap; (v) interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of HealthTap or the data contained therein; or (vi) attempt to gain unauthorized access to HealthTap or its related systems or networks.
trans-unit.target: 用户应仅使用本协议来设想HealthTap，且不得：（i）除本协议另有规定外，向任何第三方提供许可，再许可，出售，转售，出租，租赁，转让，转让，分发，分时或以其他方式商业利用或提供HealthTap; （ii）发送违反适用法律的重复或非请求邮件; （iii）发送或存储侵犯，淫秽，威胁，诽谤或其他非法或曲折的材料，包括对儿童有害或违反第三方隐私权的材料; （iv）在HealthTap上或通过HealthTap发送或存储恶意代码; （v）干扰或破坏HealthTap或其中包含的数据的完整性或性能; （vi）尝试未经授权访问HealthTap或其相关系统或网络。

trans-unit.source: B. Limited Use.
trans-unit.target: B. 使用限制。

trans-unit.source: Without the prior consent of HealthTap, during the Term of this Agreement and for a period of one (1) year following the termination of this Agreement, Subscriber shall not, directly or indirectly: (A) for Subscriber or on behalf or in conjunction with others, develop or serve as the primary owner of any business which is in competition with HealthTap or (B) enter into any other agreement or other arrangement (written or oral) with a party other than HealthTap or its affiliates to license services or provide Private Conversations similar to those described in this Agreement; provided, however, these restrictions shall not prohibit Subscriber from practicing medicine or performing services for Subscriber’s employer or otherwise that are disclosed in writing to HealthTap prior to the Effective Date.
trans-unit.target: 未经HealthTap事先授权同意，在本协议期限内以及本协议终止后一（1）年内，用户不得直接或间接：（A）为订户或代表他人或与他人一起，发展或作为与HealthTap竞争的业务的主要所有者，（B）与一方订立任何其他协议或其他安排（书面或口头），除了HealthTap或其附属公司的许可服务或提供类似于本协议中所述的私人对话; 但是，这些限制不得禁止用户在生效日期之前向HealthTap以书面形式向执行医生或为认购人的雇主执行服务。

trans-unit.source: C. Exclusivity.
trans-unit.target: C. 排他性。

trans-unit.source: In the event of an actual or threatened breach of the provisions of this Article 6, HealthTap and affiliated entities, in addition to any other remedies available to them shall be entitled to injunctive relief restraining Subscriber from such conduct.
trans-unit.target: 在实际或可能违反本第6条规定的情况下，HealthTap和附属实体除了可以获得的任何其他补救措施外，还有权限制禁止令用户免除此类行为。

trans-unit.source: D. Breach.
trans-unit.target: D. 违约。

trans-unit.source: 8. Term & Termination.
trans-unit.target: 8.期限和终止。

trans-unit.source: This Agreement commences on the Effective Date and continues for a period of days until the first day of the following month the Effective Date ("
trans-unit.target: 本协议在生效日期开始，并持续一段时间，直到下一个月的第一天为生效日期。

trans-unit.source: A. Term.
trans-unit.target: A 条款。

trans-unit.source: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon thirty (30) days written notice; upon such termination by Subscriber, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap and any such participation shall reinstate this agreement; upon such termination by HealthTap, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap. This Agreement may be terminated with cause (i) upon thirty (30) days written notice by non-breaching party of a material breach to the breaching party if such breach remains uncured at the expiration of such period; (ii) immediately, if a party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or any other proceeding relating to insolvency, receivership, liquidation or assignment for the benefit of creditors, (iii) immediately, upon notice by HealthTap upon a breach of any of Sections 3, 4 or 7(D).
trans-unit.target: 任何一方均可在三十（30）天书面通知后立即终止本协议; 在订户终止后，订户同意不再参与HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话，任何此类参与都将恢复本协议; 在HealthTap终止后，用户同意不再参加HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话。本协议可能因以下原因被终止：（i）如果违约行为在违约行为期限届满时仍未得到解决，则违约方在三十（30）天内书面通知重大违约行为; （ii）如果一方成为破产申请或与破产，接管，清算或转让有关的债权人的任何其他诉讼的主体，（iii）在HealthTap违反任何第3，4或7（D）条。

trans-unit.source: B. Termination.
trans-unit.target: B. 终止。

trans-unit.source: 10. Legal Compliance.
11. No Warranties, Mutual Indemnification and Limitations of Liability.

EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED HEREIN, NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW.
trans-unit.target: 除非本协议中明确规定，否则任何一方不得以明示，暗示，法定或其他方式提供任何保证，并且在适用的最大范围内，明确拒绝所有默示保证，包括适销性或适用于特定用途的任何担保法。

trans-unit.source: A. No Warranties.
trans-unit.target: A 无担保。

trans-unit.source: IN NO EVENT SHALL HEALTHTAP’S AGGREGATE LIABILITY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR UNDER ANY OTHER THEORY OF LIABILITY, EXCEED THE LESSER OF $100 OR THE AMOUNTS ACTUALLY PAID BY AND DUE FROM SUBSCRIBER HEREUNDER IN THE ONE MONTH PRECEDING THE INCIDENT GIVING RISE TO LIABILITY. IN NO EVENT SHALL EITHER PARTY HAVE ANY LIABILITY TO THE OTHER PARTY FOR ANY LOST PROFITS OR FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES HOWEVER CAUSED AND, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR UNDER ANY OTHER THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER OR NOT THE PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下，HEALTHTAP对由本协议产生或与本协议相关的合同不负责任，无论是在合同，侵权或任何其他责任理论中，超过100美元的损失，或者在一个月前由此处的订阅者实际支付的金额引起责任的偶发事件。在任何情况下，任何一方对于任何利润损失或任何间接，特殊，偶发，惩罚性或间接损害，无论是否合同，侵权或任何其他责任理论，均不对其他方承担任何责任，无论是否非缔约方已被告知此类损害的可能性。

trans-unit.source: B. Limitations of Liability and Damages.
trans-unit.target: B. 赔偿责任和赔偿的限制。

trans-unit.source: Subject to this Agreement, HealthTap shall defend, indemnify and hold Subscriber harmless against any loss, damage or costs (including reasonable attorneys’ fees) incurred in connection with claims, demands, suits, or proceedings ("Claims") made or brought against Subscriber by a third party alleging that the use of the HealthTap Services or a HealthTap Mark as contemplated hereunder infringes the intellectual property rights of a third party; provided, that Subscriber (a) promptly gives written notice of the Claim to HealthTap; (b) gives HealthTap sole control of the defense and settlement of the Claim; and (c) provides to HealthTap, at HealthTap’s cost, all reasonable assistance. Subject to this Agreement, Subscriber shall defend, indemnify and hold HealthTap harmless against any loss, damage or costs (including reasonable attorneys’ fees) incurred in connection with Claims made or brought against HealthTap by a third party alleging (i) the proximate and direct cause of the event giving rise to a claim for indemnification is Subscriber’s negligence in connection with a Private Conversation or follow up related to the same, (ii) fraud or misrepresentation in Subscriber’s information included in the Profile, (iii) Subscriber’s violation of legal rules or requirements in the conduct of the Private Conversations, (iv) Subscriber’s infringement of certain intellectual property rights in the use of the Content, or (v) that the where the proximate and direct cause of the event giving rise to a claim for indemnification relates to a services or action by Subscriber outside of Subscriber’s use of HealthTap or HealthTap Services; provided, that HealthTap (a) gives written notice of the Claim to Subscriber; (b) gives Subscriber sole control of the defense and settlement of the Claim; and (c) provides to Subscriber, at Subscriber’s cost, all reasonable assistance.
trans-unit.target: 根据本协议，HealthTap应就第三方声称本协议项下拟议的HealthTap服务或HealthTap标志的使用侵犯了第三方的知识产权，而针对用户做出或提出的权利主张、需求、诉讼或法律程序（“权利主张”）所发生的任何损失、损害或费用（包括合理的律师费）为用户辩护，赔偿订阅人，并使其免受伤害；倘若用户（a）及时向HealthTap发出关于权利主张的书面通知; （b）让HealthTap单独掌控权利主张的辩护和解决; 和（c）让HealthTap承担费用向HealthTap提供一切合理的帮助。根据本协议，HealthTap应就第三方声称如下行为而针对用户做出或提出的权利主张所发生的任何损失、损害或费用（包括合理的律师费）为用户辩护，赔偿订阅人，并使其免受伤害（i）要求赔偿的相近和直接原因是用户对与私人对话相关的疏忽或与此相关的跟进，（ii）在个人资料中的用户信息包含欺诈或失实陈述成分，（iii）用户违反法律规则或要求进行私人对话，（iv）用户在使用内容时侵犯某些知识产权，或（v）导致索赔的相近和直接原因涉及在订阅人使用HealthTap或HealthTap之外的服务或操作; 倘若HealthTap（a）及时向用户发出关于权利主张的书面通知; （b）让用户单独掌控权利主张的辩护和解决; 和（c）让用户承担费用向用户提供一切合理的帮助。

trans-unit.source: C. Mutual Indemnification.
trans-unit.target: C. 相互赔偿。

trans-unit.source: 12. General Provisions.

Each party represents and warrants that it has the legal power to enter into this Agreement. This Agreement does not create a partnership, joint venture, agency, fiduciary or employment relationship between the parties. This Agreement is the entire agreement between Subject and HealthTap relating to its subject matter, and replaces any prior agreements concerning its subject matter. If there is any conflict between this agreement and a mutually signed written agreement between HealthTap and Subscriber related to HealthTap, the signed written agreement will control. If HealthTap provides a translation of the English language version of this agreement, the English language version of this agreement will control if there is any conflict. If HealthTap chooses not to enforce any provision of this Agreement, HealthTap retains the right to enforce it in the future. This means that the failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement does not constitute a waiver of that provision. If any provision in this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, it and any related provisions will be interpreted to best accomplish the essential purpose of any unenforceable provision. Neither party may assign any of its rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of the other party (not to be unreasonably withheld); provided, however, HealthTap may assign this Agreement without consent of Subscriber, in connection with a merger, acquisition, corporate reorganization, or sale of all or substantially all of its assets. Any attempt by a party to assign its rights or obligations under this Agreement in breach of this section shall be void. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall bind and inure to the benefit successors and permitted assigns. This agreement is governed by California law, excluding California's choice-of-law rules. THE EXCLUSIVE VENUE FOR ANY DISPUTE RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT IS SANTA CLARA COUNTY, CALIFORNIA. YOU AND US CONSENT TO THE PERSONAL JURISDICTION OF THESE COURTS. Nothing in this agreement limits either party's ability to seek equitable relief. All notices under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been given upon: (i) personal delivery; (ii) the second business day after mailing; (iii) the second business day after sending by confirmed facsimile; or (iv) if by HealthTap to Subscriber, the second business day after sending by email. Notices shall be directed to the party’s current known address, and if by email to HealthTap, to: notice@healthtap.com.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着未能执行本协议的任何条款不构成对该条款的放弃。本协议受加州法律控制，不包括加利福尼亚的法律选择规则。与本协议有关的任何争议的独家场地是加利福尼亚州圣克拉拉县。您和我们同意这些法院的个人司法管辖权。本协议中没有任何规定限制任何一方寻求平等救济的能力。

trans-unit.source: The License and Subscription Fee shall be the License and Subscription Fee Percentage. The License and Subscription Fee Percentage is a percentage of the Conversation Fee that ranges between Twenty and Twenty-Five Percent of the Conversation Fee based on the DocScore of the Subscriber. Each separate transaction in a Private Conversation, such as a question and a follow up question, shall each be subject to a Conversation Fee.
trans-unit.target: 执业执照和订购费应是执业执照和认购费的百分比。执业执照和订购费用百分比是对话费的百分比，其范围介于基于用户的医者评分的对话费用的二十和二十五之间。在私人对话中的每个单独的交易，例如问题和后续问题，每个都需要支付对话费

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts: Business Associate Agreement
trans-unit.target: 医学专家

trans-unit.source: Under the terms of the Agreement, Subscriber shall provide, and HealthTap shall have access to, certain information some of which may constitute Protected Health Information ("
trans-unit.target: 根据协议的条款，用户应提供并且HealthTap将访问某些信息，其中一些可能构成受保护的健康信息("

trans-unit.source: The Parties desire to protect the individual privacy and provide for the security and confidentiality of the PHI and ePHI disclosed to HealthTap by Subscriber or generated or transferred by HealthTap on behalf of Subscriber in accordance with HIPAA and HIPAA Regulations and the HITECH ACT, the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (Public Law 104-191) ("
trans-unit.target: 双方希望保护个人隐私，提供由用户向HealthTap公开的，或根据HIPAA和HIPPA法规，及HITECH 法案，即1996年健康保险携带和责任法案（公法104-191）由HealthTap代表用户生成或者转让的关于PHI和ePHI的安全性和保密性("

trans-unit.source: As part of the HIPAA Regulations, Subscriber is required to obtain "satisfactory assurances" from HealthTap that it will appropriately handle and safeguard any PHI disclosed to it by Subscriber or generated by it on behalf of Subscriber and that HealthTap will implement safeguards that "reasonably and appropriately" protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of any ePHI that it creates, receives, maintains, or transmits on behalf of Subscriber. Accordingly, the Parties enter into this Addendum governing HealthTap’s use and disclosure of PHI and HealthTap’s implementation of safeguards to reasonably and appropriately protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of ePHI.
trans-unit.target: 作为HIPAA法规的一部分，用户需要从HealthTap获得“满意的保证”，它将恰当地处理和保护用户向其公开的或代表用户生成的任何PHI，并且HealthTap将实施“合理和适当地”保护其代表用户创建，接收，维护或传输的任何ePHI的保密性，完整性和可用性的措施。因此，双方签署本附录，规定HealthTap使用和公开PHI和HealthTap实施的保障措施，以合理和适当地保护ePHI的保密性，完整性和可用性。

trans-unit.source: "Business Associate" shall mean HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: “业务伙伴”指的是HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: "Covered Entity" shall mean Subscriber.
trans-unit.target: "适用主体" 是指订阅者

trans-unit.source: "Data Aggregation" shall have the same meaning given to such term in 45 C.F.R. § 164.501.
trans-unit.target: “数据集合”应与45C.F.R§164.501赋予该术语的含义相同

trans-unit.source: "Designated Record Set" shall have the same meaning given to such term in 45 C.F.R. § 164.501.
trans-unit.target: “指定记录集”应与45C.F.R§164.501赋予该术语的含义相同

trans-unit.source: "Electronic Protected Health Information" or "ePHI" shall have the same meaning as the term "electronic protected health information" in 45 C.F.R. § 160.103, limited to the information created, received, maintained or transmitted by HealthTap from or on behalf of Subscriber.
trans-unit.target: “电子保护健康信息”或“ePHI”的含义应与45 C.F.R§160.103中的“电子保护健康信息”相同，限于由HealthTap从用户处或代表用户创建，接收，维护或传输的信息。

trans-unit.source: "Health Care Operations" shall have the meaning set out in its definition at 45 C.F.R. § 164.501, as such provision is currently drafted and as it is subsequently updated, amended or revised.
trans-unit.target: “保健操作”的含义见45 C.F.R. §164.501的定义，因为这样的规定目前正在起草，之后将更新，修改或修订。

trans-unit.source: "Individual" shall have the same meaning as the term "individual" in 45 C.F.R. § 160.103 and shall include a person who qualifies as a personal representative in accordance with 45 C.F.R. § 164.502(g)
trans-unit.target: “个人”应与45 C.F.R第160.103条中的“个人”一词具有相同的含义，并应包括符合45 C.F.R. §164.502（g）符合作为个人代表资格的人。

trans-unit.source: "Privacy Rule" shall mean the Standards for Privacy of Individually Identifiable Health Information at 45 C.F.R. part 160 and part 164.
trans-unit.target: “隐私规则”指45 C.F.R. 160和164部分的“个人身份健康信息隐私标准”。

trans-unit.source: "Protected Health Information" or "PHI" shall have the same meaning as the term "protected health information" in 45 C.F.R. § 160.103, limited to the information created or received by HealthTap from or on behalf of Subscriber.
trans-unit.target: “受保护的健康信息”或“PHI”的含义应与45 C.F.R§160.103中的“受保护的健康信息”一词具有相同的含义，限于由HealthTap从用户处或代表用户创建或收到的信息。

trans-unit.source: "Required By Law" shall have the same meaning as the term "required by law" in 45 C.F.R. § 164.103.
trans-unit.target: “法律要求”应与45C.F.R§164.103中的“法律要求”一词具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: "Secretary" shall mean the Secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services or his designee.
trans-unit.target: “秘书”应指卫生和人类服务部秘书或其指定人员

trans-unit.source: "Security Rule" shall mean the Standards for Security of Electronic Protected Health Information at 45 C.F.R. part 160 and part 164.
trans-unit.target: “安全规则”是指45 C.F.R.的“保护健康电子信息安全标准”的160和164部分。

trans-unit.source: With regard to the use and/or disclosure of PHI, to the extent that HealthTap is covered by the Privacy Rule, HealthTap shall (a) Not use or further disclose PHI other than as permitted or required by this Addendum or as Required By Law; (b) Use appropriate safeguards to prevent the use or disclosure of PHI other than as provided for by this Addendum; (c) Mitigate, to the extent practicable, any harmful effect that is known to HealthTap of a use or disclosure of PHI by HealthTap in violation of the requirements of this Addendum; (d) Report to Subscriber’s designated privacy officer or other designated administrator or officer, within a reasonable period of time, any use and/or disclosure of the PHI that is not permitted or required by the terms of this Addendum and of which HealthTap becomes aware; (e) Require that any and all agents, including subcontractors, to whom it provides PHI received from, or created or received by HealthTap on behalf of Subscriber agree, in writing, to adhere to the same restrictions and conditions on the use and disclosure of PHI that apply throughout this Addendum to HealthTap with respect to such PHI; (f) Upon request of Subscriber, provide access to PHI maintained by HealthTap on behalf of Subscriber in a Designated Record Set to Subscriber or to an Individual, as directed by Subscriber, in accordance with the requirements of 45 C.F.R. § 164.524 (such access shall be permitted within a reasonable period of time and in a manner designated by Subscriber if HealthTap actually has PHI in a designated record set); (g) Upon request of Subscriber, amend PHI maintained in a Designated Record Set by HealthTap on behalf of Subscriber; (h) Make available its internal books and records relating to the use and disclosure of PHI received from, or created or received by HealthTap on behalf of, Subscriber available to Subscriber, or to the Secretary, in a time and manner designated by Subscriber or the Secretary, for purposes of the Secretary determining Subscriber’s compliance with the Privacy Rule; (i) Document information regarding HealthTap's disclosures of PHI sufficient to permit Subscriber to respond to a request by an Individual for an accounting of disclosures of PHI in accordance with 45 C.F.R. § 164.528; and (j) Upon termination of the Addendum, if feasible, destroy all PHI received from, or created or received by, HealthTap on behalf of Subscriber that HealthTap still maintains in any form and retain no copies of such PHI or, if such return or destruction is not feasible, HealthTap shall extend the protections of this Addendum to such PHI and limit further use or disclosure to those purposes that make the return or destruction of such PHI infeasible, for so long as HealthTap maintains such PHI.
trans-unit.target: 关于对被保护健康信息的使用及（或）公开，在隐私法规的涵盖范围内，HealthTap应当（a）未经允许，附录需要或法律要求，不得使用或进一步公开被保护健康信息；（b）除附录提供外，使用适当的保护措施防止被保护健康信息的使用或公开；（c）在可实行范围内减轻任何对HealthTap已知的因违反该附录要求而使用或公开被保护健康信息的有害影响；（d）在合理时间段内，向用户指定隐私官或其他指定工作人员举报任何HealthTap意识到而违背附录条款做出的使用及（或）公开被保护健康信息的行为；（e）由HealthTap代表用户以手写文本发出，创建或接收被保护健康信息给任何及所有机构，包括分承包方，这些机构必须在使用及公开被保护健康信息方面遵守相同规章制度，这在HealthTap关于被保护健康信息方面适用于附录全部内容；（f）在用户要求下，HealthTap需在指定记录设置下向用户或个人提供渠道获取被保护健康信息，一切需依照45 C.F.R. § 164.524条款的规定（如HealthTap在指定记录设置内有被保护安全信息，此过程应当在合理时间段内由用户指定）；（g）在用户要求下，HealthTap需代表用户在指定记录设置下对被保护健康信息进行修改；（h）使其有关于使用与公开被保护健康信息的内部书籍及记录对用户可得，此信息由HealthTap发出，创建或接收，HealthTap将代表用户，用户间可得或对秘书可得，由用户或秘书指定时间及方式，以便秘书决定用户对隐私条款的遵守。（i）在遵守45 C.F.R. § 164.528的前提下，关于HealthTap对被保护健康信息公开的文件信息足够于允许用户对个人要求解释关于公开被保护健康信息的回应；（j）附录条款终止后，在可行情况下，摧毁所有由HealthTap代表用户发出，创建或接收的仍保留中的被保护健康信息，且不保存任何被保护健康信息复件，如果此类归还或摧毁措施不可行，鉴于对此被保护健康信息的长期管理，HealthTap应当将对此附录的保护措施延续到被保护健康信息上，并限制因归还或摧毁被保护健康信息而进一步使用或公开信息。

trans-unit.source: Except as otherwise limited in this Addendum: (a) HealthTap may use or disclose PHI to perform functions, activities, or services for, or on behalf of, Subscriber as specified in the Agreement, provided that such use or disclosure would not violate the Privacy Rule or other applicable state or federal laws if done by Subscriber itself; (b) HealthTap may use PHI in its possession for the proper management and administration of HealthTap and the HealthTap Services or to carry out the legal responsibilities of HealthTap; (c) HealthTap may disclose PHI for the proper management and administration of HealthTap or the HealthTap Services, provided that such disclosures are Required By Law, or provided that HealthTap represents that it has obtained reasonable assurances, from the person to whom the PHI is disclosed, that it will remain confidential and be used or further disclosed only as Required By Law or for the purpose for which it was disclosed to the person, and that person notifies HealthTap of any instances of which it is aware in which the confidentiality of the PHI received has been breached; (d) Except as otherwise limited in this Addendum, HealthTap may use PHI to provide Data Aggregation services as permitted by 45 C.F.R. § 164.504(e)(2)(i)(B); and (e) HealthTap may use PHI to report violations of law to appropriate state or federal authorities as permitted by 45 C.F.R. § 164.502(j)(1).
trans-unit.target: 除非本附录另有限制：（a）HealthTap可以使用或公开被保护健康信息以保持特定功能，活动，服务的运作或在合约中注明的代表用户意愿，但HealthTap需证明用户自身使用或公开信息不违背隐私法或其他可行的州法或联邦法；（b）HealthTap可以将被保护健康信息用于适当的管理，行政，服务或执行其合法职责；（c）HealthTap可以公开被保护健康信息用于适当的管理，行政，服务，但需证明此类信息公开是由法律要求或经当事人授权，且需保证信息的保密性，若当事人发现任何违反信息保密性的举动，应告知HealthTap；（d）除该附录限制内容外，HealthTap可以在45 C.F.R. § 164.504(e)(2)(i)(B)允许情况下使用被保护健康信息以提供数据汇总；（e）在45 C.F.R. § 164.502允许下，HealthTap可以使用被保护健康信息向相关州或联邦当局举报违反法律行为。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall: (a) Notify HealthTap of any restriction to the use or disclosure of PHI that Subscriber has agreed to in accordance with 45 C.F.R. § 164.522, provided such changes affect HealthTap’s permitted or required uses and disclosures of PHI; and (b) Not request HealthTap to use or disclose PHI in any manner that would not be permitted under the Privacy Rule if done by Subscriber, except for Data Aggregation or management and administrative activities of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 订阅者应：（a）告知HealthTap任何关于根据45C.F.R§164.522用户已同意使用或公开PHI的限制，假如这些变化影响HealthTap允许或要求的PHI的使用和公开; 和（b）不能要求HealthTap按照隐私规则不允许的任何方式使用或公开PHI，除非数据聚合或HealthTap的管理和行政活动。

trans-unit.source: The Term of this Addendum shall be effective as of the commencement of the term of the Agreement, shall automatically renew with the Agreement, and shall terminate when the Agreement terminates. If this Addendum is amended, the Addendum shall renew as Amended.
trans-unit.target: 本附录条款与本协议同时生效，自动根据协议更新，协议终止时终止。如果本增编被修改，则附录应更新为修订版。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber may terminate this Addendum if HealthTap has breached a material term of this Addendum, and Subscriber: (i) has provided HealthTap with 30 days written notice of the existence of an alleged material breach; and (ii) afforded HealthTap an opportunity to respond and a reasonable period of time no less than 30 days to cure the alleged material breach; and (iii) HealthTap has not so cured the alleged material breach or reached mutually agreeable terms addressing the breach with Subscriber.
trans-unit.target: 如果HealthTap涉嫌本附录违约，用户可以终止本附录，而且用户：（i）向HealthTap提供为期30天的书面通知，说明存在被指控的重大违约行为; 和（ii）允许HealthTap在不少于30天内做出回应，解决涉嫌重大违约事件; 及（iii）HealthTap没有解决涉嫌重大违约事件或者就违约与用户达成相互同意的条款。

trans-unit.source: Upon HealthTap’s knowledge of a material breach by Subscriber, HealthTap shall either: (i) notify Subscriber of such breach in reasonable detail, and provide an opportunity for Subscriber to cure the breach or violation, or if cure is not possible, HealthTap may immediately terminate this Agreement; or (ii) if neither termination nor cure is feasible, HealthTap shall report the violation to the Secretary.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap除了了解用户严重违约的知识，也应：（i）以合理的细节告知用户违约，并允许用户解决违约事件，或者如果不可能解决，HealthTap可立即终止本协议; 或（ii）如果终止或解决都不可行，HealthTap应将违规情况报告给秘书。

trans-unit.source: In the event this Addendum is terminated, the destruction, return or continued maintenance of PHI in possession of HealthTap shall be controlled by Section 3(j) of this Addendum, and HealthTap’s obligations set forth thereunder shall survive termination of this Addendum.
trans-unit.target: 如果本附录终止，归HealthTap所有的PHI的销毁，撤回或继续维护应按本附录第3（j）节解决，HealthTap根据本附录规定的义务在本附录终止后仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: A reference in this Addendum to a section in the Privacy Rule means the section as in effect or as amended, and for which compliance is required.
trans-unit.target: 本附录中对“隐私规则”部分的引用是指有效或已修改的部分，以及需要遵守的部分。

trans-unit.source: Any ambiguity in this Addendum shall be resolved in favor of a meaning that permits Subscriber to comply with the Privacy Rule and the Security Rule.
trans-unit.target: 本附录中的任何歧义应以允许用户遵守隐私规则和安全规则的含义解释。

trans-unit.source: The validity, enforceability and interpretation of this Addendum shall be governed by the same laws as are applicable to the Agreement and where applicable by the Privacy Rule and the Security Rule.
trans-unit.target: 本附录的有效性，可执行性和解释应受适用于本协议以及隐私规则和安全规则适用的相同法律的约束。

trans-unit.source: We value your privacy, and this Privacy Statement describes how we will protect and handle the personal information that you provide to us through our HealthTap Web-based and mobile based service, and related web sites. Among other things, the HealthTap Privacy Statement explains:
trans-unit.target: 我们重视您的隐私权，而且本隐私声明描述了我们将如何保护和处理您通过基于HealthTap网络和移动服务以及相关网站提供给我们的个人信息。在其他事务中，HealthTap隐私声明解释了

trans-unit.source: When you sign up for HealthTap you verify that you’ve read and agree to our Privacy Statement. Since you are agreeing to what’s contained in this document when using the Site, we encourage you to read it (if you haven't already).
trans-unit.target: 当您注册或使用HealthTap，代表您已经核实：您已阅读并同意我们的隐私权声明。由于您在使用本网站时已同意本文档中包含的内容，我们建议您阅读本文档（如果您尚未阅读）。

trans-unit.source: . If you are not satisfied with our response you can contact

including transparency, accountability and choice regarding the collection and use of your personal information. TRUSTe's mission, as an independent third party, is to accelerate online trust among consumers and organizations globally through its leading privacy trustmark and innovative trust solutions. If you have questions or complaints regarding our privacy policy or practices, please contact us at
trans-unit.target: 包括在收集和使用您的个人信息方面的透明度，问责制和选择。作为独立第三方，TRUSTe的任务是通过其领先的隐私信任标志和创新的信任解决方案，加速全球消费者和组织之间的在线信任。如果您对我们的隐私政策或做法有任何疑问或投诉，请与我们联系

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been awarded TRUSTe's Privacy Seal signifying that this Privacy Statement and practices have been reviewed by TRUSTe for compliance with
trans-unit.target: HealthTap已获得TRUSTe的隐私标签，表示此隐私声明和操作已通过TRUSTe的审查，且符合

trans-unit.source: Can I send other users messages? Can they send me Messages?
trans-unit.target: 我可以向其他用户发送信息吗？他们可以给我发消息吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your use of HealthTap is anonymous. Your real name, date of birth, e-mail address, and other Personally Identifiable Information are not visible on the site to other users. You select a name under which you appear when using the Site (a Public Profile Name). You can stay anonymous by selecting a confidential Public Profile Name and by keeping that private. HealthTap uses bank-level security and encryption. More about our security measures can be found
trans-unit.target: 是。您的真实姓名、出生日期、电子邮件地址和其他个人身份信息不会显示给其他成员。您可以选择隐秘的公开资料名称并将其私有化，以保护您的隐私。

trans-unit.source: on our Secure Sharing and Privacy page.
trans-unit.target: 在我们的安全分享和隐私页面

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is designed with your privacy in mind. Users are identified by a Public Profile Name that they choose and can change at any time. Safeguarding your privacy and anonymity online takes a little common sense. We've provided some tips about how to
trans-unit.target: HealthTap被设计成时刻保护您的隐私的系统用户由他们选择的公共资料名称标识，并且可以随时更改。保卫您的隐私和在线匿名需要一点常识我们对此提供了一些贴士

trans-unit.source: No. We have a strict “NO-SPAM” policy. We won’t ever sell, trade or give away any email address you enter, unless you tell us it’s OK. The e-mail address entered when you log into HealthTap is not visible to anyone but you. We've provided more information
trans-unit.target: 我们有严格的“无垃圾邮件”政策。我们不会出售，交易或泄露您输入的任何电子邮件地址，除非您告诉我们这没关系。只有您可以看到您登录HealthTap时输入的电子邮件地址。我们提供了更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your e-mail address is not displayed in your Public Profile, and is never visible to other users on HealthTap. For more information about how we keep your Personally Identifiable information safe and secure, see
trans-unit.target: 是。有关我们如何保护您个人身份信息，详情请参阅

trans-unit.source: Personally Identifiable Information is information that identifies specifically who you are. This includes information such as your full name and your e-mail address. We keep this information private by not displaying it or sharing it. We keep this information secure, using state of the art encryption among other security measures. More information about our security can be found on our
trans-unit.target: 个人身份信息是指可以确认您身份的信息。

trans-unit.source: Every user has a Public Profile. Your Public Profile is how other users will see you on the Site. Your Public Profile is your Public Profile Name, and an image or avatar you choose (your Public Profile Picture). It does not contain any Personally Identifiable Information, unless you put such information in your Public Profile Name or Public Profile Picture. Do not use your real name, picture or any other Personally Identifiable Information in your Public Profile Name and avatar. Each user’s Public Profile is linked to that user’s Health Activity, so that all users on the Site can find similar Public Profiles, and so that we can all share in communal health learning.
trans-unit.target: 每个用户都有一份公开资料。您的公开个人资料是其他用户在网站上看到您的方式。您的公开资料包含您的名字，以及您选择的图片或头像（您的公开资料照片）。它不包含任何个人身份信息，除非您将此类信息加入您的公开个人资料名字或公开个人资料照片中。不要在您的公开个人资料名称和头像中使用您的真实姓名，照片或其他任何个人身份信息。每个用户的公开资料都链接到该用户的健康活动，以便网站上的所有用户都可以找到类似的公开资料，而且在公共健康学习方面共享。

trans-unit.source: As this example shows, some of the information stored in you Health Activity is displayed in your Public Profile. Your real name, and other Personally Identifiable Information, are never shown in your Public Profile (unless you put it there). You can turn off sharing of various site features, including Health Activity sharing, at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您的真实姓名和其他个人可识别信息将不会显示在您的公开形象中。（除非您将它们置于此处。）

trans-unit.source: IF YOU CHOOSE TO SHARE INFORMATION OUTISDE OF HEALTAP, THIS IS YOUR CHOICE. THERE IS ALWAYS A CHANCE THAT INFOMRATION YOU SHARE OUTSIDE OF HEALTHTAP MAY BE USED IN AN ATTEMPT T IDENTIFY YOU OR MAY BE USED IN WAYS THAT YOU OR HEALTHTAP CANNOT CONTROL.
trans-unit.target: 如果您选择在Healthtap以外的地方公开信息，这将会是您的个人选择。您在HEALTHTAP以外的网站所公开的信息总是会有可能被用作尝试识别您的个人身份，或者被利用在Healthtap以及您自己都无法控制的方面。

trans-unit.source: Some HealthTap users are also caregivers who are responsible for managing the health of other loved ones (for example, a mother with a baby). A care recipient is a person whose health is under the custody of the caregiver, or who has granted a caregiver permission to provide data about the care recipient to HealthTap. Caregivers must be over the age of 18. If a care recipient is under the age of 13, and the care recipient wishes to enter any information into HealthTap, please see the section below on protecting
trans-unit.target: 一些HEALTHTAP的使用者同时也是承担管理其他亲人（例如，孕妇）健康责任的护理人员。健康接收者就是在护理人员的监管下，允许照顾者给HealthTap提供他的数据信息的人。照顾者必须年满18岁。如果年龄在十三岁以下的健康接收者希望在HEALTHTAP中输入信息，请阅读下方的保护条例。

trans-unit.source: Each HealthTap user has a Public Profile. HealthTap allows users to find other people who are similar to them by navigating through the site. Each user's Public Profile contains information that is visible to other users on HealthTap. To protect your identity, your real name or other Personally Identifiable Information is never displayed in your Public Profile.
trans-unit.target: 每个用户都有一份公开资料。HealthTap允许用户通过浏览这个网站去发现其他与自己相似的人。在HealthTap上，每一位用户公开的资料都包含着对其他用户可见的信息。为了保护您的身份，您的真实姓名以及其他个人身份信息绝对不会显示在您的公开资料中。

trans-unit.source: When one user follows another, the follower will see certain information about the user being followed. This information includes certain updates that the user being followed provides to HealthTap and that appear in the Public Profile of the user being followed.
trans-unit.target: 当一位用户关注另一位用户时，关注者将会看见被关注用户的特定信息。这些信息包提供给HealthTap的被跟踪用户的更新, 以及出现在用户的公开资料中。

trans-unit.source: Our Site offers publicly accessible areas (“Public Areas”). Public Areas include, but are not limited to, questions, Answers, Tips, and information visible in your Public Profile. You should be aware that any information you provide in these areas might be read, collected, and used by others who access them. To request removal of your Personally Identifiable Information from these areas, contact us at
trans-unit.target: 我们网站提供可公开访问的区域（“公共区域”）。公开的区域包括，但并不限制问题、回答、贴士以及您公开资料中可见的信息。您需要了解的是您提供在这些区域的任何信息都可以被进入的用户阅读、收集和使用。如需将您的个人可识别信息从这些区域中移除，请联系我们

trans-unit.source: Aggregated information is information from multiple users that is not associated with any individual user account, statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account, and de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information, such as first and last names or e-mail addresses. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run our service. We may use aggregated information or de-identified data gathered from HealthTap and related statistics to improve the services provided through HealthTap, and for research and analysis. We may also provide this information to our partners for such purposes.
trans-unit.target: 聚集的信息和去可识别性的数据和统计被用来经营我们的服务。我们会使用从HealthTap收集的聚合信息或去可识别性数据以及相关统计来改善服务，增进研究和分析。

trans-unit.source: for more information about how to use our service.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用我们的服务的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap offers information to support the health decisions that you decide to make, in connection with the medical advice and guidance you receive from your doctor. The choices you make are yours. HealthTap does not provide medical advice, is not a doctor, and the information on HealthTap should not be used to delay or replace professional medical treatment. HealthTap does not make recommendations or endorsements. Please see our
trans-unit.target: HealthTap提供与您的医生做出的医疗建议和指导相联系的信息以支持您做出的健康决定。HealthTap不提供建议或推荐。

page; if this information does not answer your specific question, you can contact us at

trans-unit.source: The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. Experts design our security measures, and we use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use, and disclosure. For example, information transferred between you and the site is encrypted. We restrict access to personal information to HealthTap employees, contractors, and agents who need to know that information in order to operate, develop, or improve our services. These individuals are bound by confidentiality obligations and may be subject to discipline, including termination and criminal prosecution, if they fail to meet these obligations. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have any specific questions about security on our Site, please see our
trans-unit.target: 我们严格限制需要了解个人信息以运营、开发或改进我们的服务的HealthTap的员工、承包商和代理商获取这些信息。这些个人受保密义务的约束，如果他们没有尽到这些义务将会受到包括终止业务和犯罪起诉在内的法律的制约。然而没有一种网络传输或电子储存的方法是100%安全的。

trans-unit.source: Currently, we only let you provide us with information about you (except in the case of a Caregiver providing information about a Care Recipient). This Privacy Statement applies to this information. In the future, we may allow users to provide us with information by or through other separately operated products or services.

trans-unit.source: This Privacy Statement does not apply to other service providers or links to other sites that are not owned or controlled by HealthTap, and you should read the individual privacy polices and terms of service of these providers before using their services. trans-unit.source: We are committed to protecting the privacy of children. This Site is not intended or designed for children under the age of 13. We do not collect Personally Identifiable Information from any person we actually know is a child under the age of 13. trans-unit.source: If you don’t find an answer you’re 100% happy with by looking at similar questions on HealthTap, feel free to edit and improve your question. Our doctors are able to select which questions to answer, and may skip questions that aren’t answerable, clear, and/or detailed. Ways to improve your question include: add enough detail to make it meaningful, answerable, and easy to understand; ask about just one topic in your question; and double-check your spelling and grammar.

trans-unit.source: You have jock itch, so buy some OTC Lotrimin cream and use it twice a day for 2 weeks. Keep your groin dry, and your rash should be gone in a couple of weeks.
trans-unit.target: 您有股癣，所以买一些非处方的Lotrimin霜（ 一种抗真菌药品牌，通用名是克霉唑），每天两次涂用，为期2周。保持您的腹股沟干燥,您的皮疹应该在几周内消失。

trans-unit.source: Itchy, reddened, slightly flaky skin in the groin skin folds can be from jock itch or other causes. Jock itch (tinea cruris) is caused by a fungus germ, and is usually treated with over-the-counter Lotrimin AF cream or with prescription anti-fungal medication from a doctor.
trans-unit.target: 腹股沟处的皮肤瘙痒，发红，轻微片状可能是由股癣或其他原因所致。股癣（一种癣）是由真菌引起的，通常用非处方Lotrimin AF霜或医生开的抗真菌的处方药物进行治疗。

trans-unit.source: You, a physician applying to or currently providing virtual consults on HealthTap or any physician on whose behalf this Agreement is entered into (“Provider”), agree to designate HealthTap to purchase and maintain malpractice insurance with a minimum annual coverage of one million dollars per incident and three million dollars in aggregate, or HealthTap’s subsequent liability minimums, to cover any acts of malpractice committed during the performance of virtual consults on HealthTap, subject to any limitations specified herein or in the policy (“Insurance”). Generally, the Insurance provides claims-made coverage for medical malpractice claims brought in the U.S., including U.S. claims made by claimants in other countries. The coverage excludes consults or interactions outside of the HealthTap platform, claims brought outside of the U.S., and is not available to Providers with no other means of participating in a Patient Compensation Fund (“PCF”) program if the Provider practices in a state where PCF participation is required. The Insurance is secondary to any other applicable or available insurance policy. Provider agrees to provide to HealthTap or the Insurance carrier, upon request, information related to your medical practice, licensure, or events or circumstances likely to impact coverage eligibility. This agreement is in addition to any other agreements governing use of the HealthTap platform, and any representations and warranties therein. In the event of a claim covered or potentially covered by the Insurance and related to services provided under this Agreement and on or through a HealthTap platform (including the HealthTap website and mobile apps), Provider agrees to comply with the terms required by the Insurance to receive the benefit of coverage and to: (i) cooperate with the investigation, settlement of defense of any claim(s); (ii) immediately send HealthTap copies of any demands, notices, summons or legal papers received in connection with a claim; (iii) notify any other insurer whose coverage is or may be available; (iv) cooperate with the insurer with respect to coordinating any other available or potentially available insurance; (v) provide the insurer with written authorization to (a) obtain records and other information related to the claim, and (b) conduct and control the defense of the Physician in such claim. By opting into this program, Provider agrees that HealthTap may withhold an additional administrative fee for the provision of this service from any payments to Provider. Currently this fee is one dollar ($1) per consult, on top of any other fees applicable to the performance of consults through the HealthTap platform. Provider may opt out of this coverage at any time, but waiting periods may apply to any future request to participate in this program. HealthTap retains the rights to end this program or to end Provider’s participation in this program at any time and for any reason, and shall provide Provider with written notice of any such termination, in which case coverage shall apply to virtual consults up to the date of such termination.
trans-unit.target: 您，不管是正在申请还是目前已经在HealthTap进行在线咨询，或是代表本协议签订的任何医生（“提供者”），同意指定HealthTap购买和维护医疗事故保险，最低年度费用为100万美元，事件和总计300万美元，或HealthTap随后的赔偿责任最低值，以涵盖在HealthTap上进行在线咨询期间所犯的任何违规行为，但须遵守本文或策略（“保险”）中规定的任何限制。一般来说，保险为在美国提出的医疗事故索赔提供索赔保险，包括其他国家的索赔人提出的美国索赔。覆盖范围不包括HealthTap平台之外的咨询或交互，在美国以外提出的索赔，如果供应商在一个需要PCF参与州（州）的诊疗中没有其他方式参与患者赔偿基金（“PCF”）计划。保险次于任何其他适用或可用的保险单。提供者同意向HealthTap或保险运营商提供与您的医疗诊疗，许可证或可能影响覆盖资格的事件或情况相关的信息。本协议是关于使用HealthTap平台的任何其他协议以及其中的任何声明和保证。如果保险涵盖或可能涉及保险并涉及本协议提供的服务，并且通过HealthTap平台（包括HealthTap网站和移动应用程序），提供方同意遵守保险要求的条，获得覆盖的好处，并：(i) 配合任何索赔的调查或声明的辩护; (ii)立即寄送出与索偿有关的任何要求，通知，传票或法律文件的HealthTap副本; (iii) 通知其他保险公司，其覆盖范围是有或可能有的; (iv) 与保险人合作协调任何其他现有或潜在可用的保险; (v) 向保险人提供书面授权，以(a) 取得与该项申索有关的纪录及其他资料，及(b) 在该项申索中进行及控制医生的抗辩。通过选择加入此计划，提供者同意HealthTap可以通过向提供者的任何付款提出额外的行政费用。目前，除了通过HealthTap平台执行咨询的任何其他费用外，此费用是每次咨询1美元($1)提供商可以随时选择退出此保险，但等待期可能适用于任何未来参与此计划的请求。HealthTap保留终止本计划或在任何时间和任何原因终止提供方参与此计划的权利，并应向提供方提供任何此类终止的书面通知，在这种情况下，覆盖范围应适用于在线咨询终止的最后日期。
